GSP28mimslovu:16: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa vijñānavādānte“ato na vyabhicarati pratyakṣam“iti pratyakṣāvyabhicāritvamupasaṃhṛtya 'anumānaṃ jñātasambandhasye' tyādinānumānalakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam /
GSP28mimslovu:21: tatra pratyakṣāvyabhicāritve pratipādite vyabhicārikaraṇaprabhavatvena tāvad vyabhicāraśaṅkā prayuktā /
GSP28mimslovu:30: anena ca ślokena samarthitārambhāvasara' prapañco viśeṣato vyākhyāsyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:32: nātra naiyāyikādivadalokikaṃ pramāṇānāṃ svarūpamupadarśayituṃ lakṣaṇāni praṇītāni /
GSP28mimslovu:39: tatra na vidma' ko jñātasambandhasamāsārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:40: na tāvata puruṣa' sambandhī samudāyo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:43: nanu buddhisambandhopasthāpita' puruṣa' samudāyidvayākṣipta' samudāyo vā viśeṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:57: ata' kasyaigadeśasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ sa evaikadeśo jñātasambandhasyeti viśeṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:60: na hi bhavati puruṣaṃ pratyupasarjanībhutasya rājña' ṛddhasya rājapuraṣa iti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:63: ka ākāṅkṣitaṃ hi pūraṇasamarthamupasarjanenāpi sambadhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:68: ata eva hi kasya gurukulamiti vyavahāropapatti' /
GSP28mimslovu:69: tatra hi kulopasarjanasyaiva guro' kasyeti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:70: api ca darśanakriyākarmaṇo dṛśyasyaikadeśasya prādhānyamaprādhanasya sāpekṣasyāpi padāntareṇa sambandho dṛṣṭa',
GSP28mimslovu:74: uktaṃ hi guruṇaiva-“nopasarjanaṃ padaṃ padāntareṇa samabadhyate ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa itivat“iti /
GSP28mimslovu:79: yattūktam- ākāṅkṣā sambandhe hetu'' iti tadayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:81: athocyeta ekavākyatāyāmayaṃ doṣa' ekadeśadarśanāda ekadeśāntare buddhiranumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:82: ata' paryavasite vākye kasyaikadeśasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vākyagatamekadeśasyeti padaṃ jñātasambandhasyeti viśeṣyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:91: na ca vāstavaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvamāśritya padāntarasambandho dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:102: naca vāstavaṃ prādhānyamupasarjanasya padāntarasambandhe sāpekṣasamāse vā hetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:103: kasya gurukulamiti nityasāpekṣatvād guruśabdasya nāsāmarthyaṃ doṣa' na hyanantarbhāvya pratisambandhinaṃ gurvartho 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:111: kintu pramātaiva buddhisambandhopasthāpito jñātasambandha iti nirdiśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:113: na hi nama' pinākapāṇaya ityanayapadārthānupādānaṃ doṣāya /
GSP28mimslovu:114: api ca aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātīti bahuvrīhisamāsārtho devatātaddhita' kathamāhṛtyānupātte somarase vartate /
GSP28mimslovu:115: atha somaṃ krīṇāti abhiṣuṇoti pāvayatidhārayā gṛhṇātīti prakaraṇavagata' somaraso 'nyapadārtha ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:117: pūrvapakṣasthitena vārtikakṛtā gamyamānaṃ na viśeṣyata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva durlabhalabdhamivamanvānai' kaiścidvalgitamityupekṣaṇīyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:118: siddhānte hi gamyamānāyā eva vyaktergāvau gāva' śuklo gauriti ca vibhaktyā śabdāntareṇa ca viśeṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:127: yastu vaiyātyād dhūmaśabdenāgniṃ lakṣayitvā tathā prayuyuṅkṣati na taṃ nivārayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:128: nanvevaṃ pramātari jñātasambandhe sati naikadeśo viśeṣita iti vyāpakakaikadeśadṛśo vyāpyasmṛtiranumānamāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:132: tatra hi jñātasambandhasyaikadeśasyeti ṣaṣṭhyā vyāpya eva sambandhī pratipādyate /
GSP28mimslovu:133: sarvatra hi vyāpya eva hi ṣaṣṭhī dṛṣṭā /
GSP28mimslovu:136: lokaprasiddhameva tvaparīkṣāpratipādanārthaṃ svarūpamanūdyate loke hi niyāmyaikadeśadarśana eva niyāmakaikadeśajñānamanumānamiti prasiddhamiti
GSP28mimslovu:149: bhavati hi 'vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna tu sandehādalakṣaṇam' iti sūktaṃ pramātā jñātasambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:153: ekadeśau hi naikadeśinamantareṇa syātāmiti ākṣiptasyaikadeśino yuktamanyapadārthatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:158: yadyekatadapi paramparayā vājapeyasya yūpa itivadekadeśino bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:159: ka' punaratraikakadeśī jñātasambandha' pakṣa' sapakṣo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:163: ata' pakṣaikadeśino 'pi sāmānyato dhūmavattaupādhikasambandho jñāta iti sa eva jñātasaṃbandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:164: sāmānyato gṛhīte 'pi deśādi ekadeśyaikadeśau cāśrayāśrayiṇāvabhimatau / na
GSP28mimslovu:168: atra ca pakṣe saṃbandhini gamye gamake caikadeśatā /
GSP28mimslovu:180: kiṃ puna' karmadhārayapakṣe dvayānyapadārthve vā prameyam /
GSP28mimslovu:192: atrābhidhīyate- ayamatrārtho jñātasya sambandhasya jñātasambandhasya vā dvayasya kvacidekadeśadarśanāt tatraivaikadeśāntare buddhiranumānamiti
GSP28mimslovu:208: kintu agnyādau sati dhūmāderbhāvādasati cābhāvāt tadāyattasvabhāvo dhūmādiriti vidite tadavinābhāva' siddhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:224: kāraṇarasā hi kārye rasamārambhantekāraṇarūpāṇi ca kārye rūpam /
GSP28mimslovu:228: tathāvidhasyaiva kāraṇatvāt pravṛttiśaktinā ca kāraṇena rūpaṃ janyata iti rūpasiddhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:229: tadidamanupapannam yat tāvat kāryaṃ kāraṇena vinā na bhavatīti tatastajjñānamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:231: kathaṃ hi kāraṇena vinā kāryameva na bhavati ityetadevāvaseyam /
GSP28mimslovu:232: tadvinā bhavato nityaṃ sattvasattvaṃ vā syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:240: yadyevamanyo 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt svabhāvaniyama' yadanapekṣaṃ tannityaṃ sadasadvā bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:246: nanu nādo rūpasya kāryaṃ nātmeti kathaṃ tadagame hetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:254: api tarhi rūpavadrūpakāraṇasahakāriṇā rasakāraṇena raso janyate /
GSP28mimslovu:264: prāgeva tu tannirṇaye vṛthā rūpataddhetvo' sahakāritvakalpanā /
GSP28mimslovu:268: api tarhi rūparasayo' sāhityaniyamāt sahasaiva rasād rūpamanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:269: api ca kāryakāraṇabhūtayoreva bahulamanumānavyavahāro dṛśyate ityanādṛtyaṃ kāryatvamavyabhacāre /
GSP28mimslovu:271: kiṃ hi vṛkṣātmani śiṃśapātve vidite meyamavaśiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:278: evameva vaiśiṣikādisamayasiddhā api kāryakāraṇabhāvādaya' sambandhaprakārā' prayuktā veditavyā' /
GSP28mimslovu:283: īkṣate khalvayaṃ visphāritākṣa' sahasā mahānase dhūmamagninā sahitam /
GSP28mimslovu:298: api ca nirūpitarūpā api bhāvā deśādibhedeṣvanyathābhavanto 'nūbhūyanta iti na svabhāvaniyamaṃ pratyāśrayitumucitaṃ prāmāṇikānām /
GSP28mimslovu:302: vyāpyasya gamakatvaṃ ca vyāpakaṃ gamyamiṣyate // Msv_5,4.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:303: yo yasya deśakālābhyāṃ samonyūno 'pi vā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:306: na hyanyathā bhavatyeṣā vyāpyavyāpakatā tayo' // Msv_5,4.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:314: yadi jñātasambandhasyānumānaṃ sa tarhi sambandho sambanadhe dvyāśraya ityubhayānu māne liṅgaṃ syādata āha-vyāpyeti //4//
GSP28mimslovu:325: sa hi tasya deśakālau tāvad vyāpnotyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:328: tena kāraṇena vyāpya eva gṛhīte vyāpakasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati yadasau taṃ vināpi na bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:330: yena taṃ vināpi bhavastaṃ na gamayet /
GSP28mimslovu:331: agnistvavaṃvidha iti nāsau dhūmasya gamako bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:336: vyāpyatvād gamikā gāvo vyāpikā na viṣāṇitā // Msv_5,4.8 //
GSP28mimslovu:340: loke ca vyāpyaikadeśadarśina eva vyāpakajñānamanumānamiti siddham /
GSP28mimslovu:341: nahyanyatheti cāpakṛṣya pūrveṇa yojayitvā teneti tadupajīvanena vyākhyeyamiti //6//
GSP28mimslovu:346: ato vyāpakaṃ gamyaṃ vyāpyaṃ gamakamityavyāpakamata āha-vyāpakatveti /
GSP28mimslovu:350: tena hi rūpeṇa gṛhīto 'sau vyāpād deśakālādhikye 'pi na virūdhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:352: astu nāmavastutatastattu rūpaṃ na gṛhītamiti kathaṃ gamakatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:353: avagate tu tādrūpye tenaivagamakatvaṃ na vyāpakatayā /
GSP28mimslovu:361: tatrāpi vyāpyataiva syādaṅgaṃ na vyāpitā mite' // Msv_5,4.9 //
GSP28mimslovu:363: deśe yāvati kāle vā vyāpatā prāṅanirūpitā // Msv_5,4.10 //
GSP28mimslovu:364: evamasaṅkare gamyakagamakavivekād yatrāpi vyāptisaṅkaro bhavati tatrāpi vyāpyatvameva gamakatve kāraṇamiti niṣkṛṣyata ityāha- teneti //9//
GSP28mimslovu:366: kasya punariyaṃ saṃyogina' samavāyina' sambandhisambandhino vā /
GSP28mimslovu:375: na cāsau bhūmau pratiṣṭhitenāgnināgaganagatasya dhūmāgrasya sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:376: naca bhūmiṣṭhāṃ śaṅkucchāyāṃ divi vartamāna' ṛkṣodayo 'veti /
GSP28mimslovu:377: vyāptiśca kasyacit kenacid bhavantī deśato vā syāt kālato vā /
GSP28mimslovu:378: pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvi' saviturudayasyādyatanārkasyaivodayāt aṣṭau yāmānatikramyānumānaṃ na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:393: yāvati hi deśe kāle vā vartamānasya yasya vāpyatā nirūpitapūrvā,
GSP28mimslovu:394: yāvaddeśakālabhāvinā vyāpakena tasya vyāpakāṃśasya tāvatyeva deśādau vartamānasya sa vyāpyāṃśastādṛgeva,
GSP28mimslovu:395: gaganādivartidharmyantare dṛṣṭāntadhadharmyapekṣayā sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭa' san pratipādako bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:396: tasya tāvati tādṛk sa dṛṣṭo dharmyantare puna' /
GSP28mimslovu:402: deśe yāvatītyanatidūramadhirūḍhasya dhūmāderdūrataravartino 'pi nadīpūrasya vyāptiṃ darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:407: nanvasyāṃ vyāptau na kiñcit pramāṇamastītyuktamata āha-bhūyodarśaneti /
GSP28mimslovu:412: no khalvasya sahasāgnadhūmāvagniśaraṇe vilokayamānasyāgninā vyāpto dhūma iti matirāvirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:421: na tāvat pūrvaṃ vyāpteravadhāraṇe samartham apratisandhānāt /
GSP28mimslovu:429: pratyakṣe ca vyāptipramāṇe kathamataphalebhya' puṃviśeṣeṣu vaidikakarmānumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:430: na ca tattatkarmaniyamastasya tasya paśvāde' phalasyāparokṣamīkṣyate atīndriyatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:441: na ca sahitāvadhāritayorasatyāṃ vyāptau kiñcidanupapannaṃ nāma//
GSP28mimslovu:446: bhūyāṃsi darśanānyevāsatyāṃ vyāptau nopapadyanta iti cet,
GSP28mimslovu:447: kiṃ hi teṣāṃ vyāptimantareṇa na sambhavati svarūpaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:449: svagocaraprakāśanamapi svata eva viṣasyāpi svapramāṇaparicchannasya na kiñcidanapapannaṃ paśyāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:452: na ca bhāvasvarūpā vyāptirabhāvena pramīyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:459: itarayā vyāvartate khalvayaṃ śaśaviṣāṇābhāvādapīti śaśaviṣāṇenāpi niyamyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:465: vyāpyate ca śaśaviṣāṇena tadabhāvānnivṛtto dhūmaityanagniriva tadabhāvo 'pi vipakṣa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:472: manastu sakalātītādiviṣayaparicchedasādhāraṇaṃ pratibaddhasāmarthyaṃ kvaciditi tadabalabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa vyāptirgrahīṣyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:475: no khalvapi bahirviṣayabodhe mana' svatantramiti varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:477: svatantre hi bahiriṣyamāṇe manasi sarva' sarvadarśī syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:481: tathāpi pūrvapūrvāṃnubhavajanitasaṃskārasanāthaṃ bahirapi vartiṣyate cakṣurādyanugṛhītamiva rūpādau /
GSP28mimslovu:485: smṛtimātrahetavo hi pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitā' saṃskārānatsahante manaso bahiravagrahe 'nugrahamādhātum /
GSP28mimslovu:488: sa ced grahaṇe kvacinmanasa' sahāyī bhavatīti kiṃ na smṛtiviṣayāntarāṇyapi grāhyatīti yat kiñcidetat /
GSP28mimslovu:492: na hīdānīmatra vā tayo' sambandha iti bhavati mati' /
GSP28mimslovu:493: api tarhi sannihitavartamānayorevedantayā pratibhāsamānayordeśakālau sambandhaśca tayorviśeṣaṇamimau sambaddhāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:496: tadevamanavacchinnarūpa' svābhāvika eva saṃbandha' siddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:501: vahnirhi dhūmena saṃyukta' saṃvedito 'pi kadācidvidhūmo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:503: na tu svābhāviko 'gnerdhūmena saṃbandha iti niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:509: prayatnenāpi cānviṣṭo na dṛṣṭa upādhirnāstīti niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:512: sa vaktavya' kimidānīṃ sāhityamātramanumānāṅgaṃ tanniyamo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:513: yadi sāhityamātraṃ tattarhi prathamadarśana eva samadhigatamiti punardhūmadarśino 'viditavyāpterapyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:514: atha tanniyama' tasyaivedaṃ pramāṇamanusriyate kuta' sidhyatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:515: na hi prathamadarśino 'yamanena niyata iti matirāvirbhavantī dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:518: sa tarhi tathāvidha' prathamamevāvagata iti bhūyodarśanaṃ nāpekṣeta /
GSP28mimslovu:522: yadyanavacchinnasyāpi deśata' kālato vā kadācit kasyacit kasyacid viyogo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:527: na cātra pratiniyama' iyadabhirdarśanairavyabhicāra' sidhyati iti /
GSP28mimslovu:528: nanu dhūmasyāpyagnisabandhe na kaścidupādhirupalabhyate agneriva dhūmasaṃbandhe /
GSP28mimslovu:529: ata' kathamasau satyapi dhūme na bhaviṣyati / na /
GSP28mimslovu:532: dṛṣṭaṃ hi kvacid deśe kharjūrāṇāṃ piṇḍakharjūraphalatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:535: tadvat dhūmo 'pi jātu jāyetāntareṇāpi hutāśanaṃ kvaciditi śaṅkamānā na tasya niyamamagninādhyavasyanti śatāṃśenāpi /
GSP28mimslovu:536: vipakṣād vyāvṛtti'śaṅkamānā anumānodayaṃ pratibandhātīti katarañcedaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:547: kiṃ khalu vyāptigocaraṃ jñānaṃ na jāyata eva,
GSP28mimslovu:554: dṛśyate hi bahulaṃ dhūmamagnāvupalamāno 'yamanena niyata ityavadhāraṇapura' saraṃ tato 'gnimanumāya tadanurūpaṃ vyavaharamāṇa' /
GSP28mimslovu:560: tad yathāyogyaṃ kasyacit kasyāñcit vyāptasaṃvittau vyavasthāpayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:569: prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāye carame darśane cetasi cakāsti dhūmasya vahniniyatasvabhāvatvaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:574: na hyetat sarvamāpātānna pratibhātamiti parastādapi bhāsamānamanyathā bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:576: nanūktaṃ na smṛteranyatra saṃskārā vyāpriyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:577: kena vā saṃskārāṇāṃ smṛteranyatra vyāpāra upeyate /
GSP28mimslovu:578: smārayanta eva tu te pūrvapūrvāvagatamagnisambandhaṃ dhūmasya vyāptisaṃvidaṃ janayitumabhipravṛttacasyendriyasya sahāyībhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:581: na ca yat sahasā na pratibhāti tatpaścādapi pratibhāsamānaṃ pratyakṣatāṃ jahāti /
GSP28mimslovu:583: nanu na tāvadāpātajaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyāptau pramāṇamiti bhaṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:584: tatapūrvakaṃ ca savikalpakamiti kathaṃ tasyāpi prāmāṇyam /
GSP28mimslovu:585: asti vā brāhmaṇādipratyakṣe nirvikalpakāvasthāyāṃ vṛddhādāviv narāntaraviviktākārapratibhāsa' /
GSP28mimslovu:588: yathā tu tatra piṇḍamātradarśina' smṛtayonisambandhasya brāhmaṇo 'yamiti pratyakṣaṃ jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:589: evamihāpi bahuśo 'gnidhūmadarśino 'ntime darśane nirvikalpavṛttadhūmasvalakṣaṇasyāgninā niyato 'yamiti dhūsvabhāvagocaraṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimslovu:593: tacceha vyaktidarśana eva pūrvasaṃskārodabodhāt siddhamiti nāvaśyamanayo' samānaviṣayatā /
GSP28mimslovu:599: ata' parastādeva sahakārivaśāt nirvikalpakopadarśitavyaktiviṣayaṃ ghṛtamidamiti savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamīvirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:603: asya hi bahulaṃ dhūmamagnāvupalabhamānasyānagnau ca vyatirekamante bhavati vimarśa'- api syād vyāpto 'yamaneneti /
GSP28mimslovu:605: ca tṛmadārugomayendhanādisamavadhānaviśeṣaṃ pratyanādṛto 'gnimevānudhāvatyanagnau ca na bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:610: tanna tāvad dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ nāpi śrutamiti nāśaṅkāmadhirohati /
GSP28mimslovu:611: evamapi tu śaṅkamānasya sarvapramāṇeṣvanāśvāsa' kvacid vyabhicāradarśanāt /
GSP28mimslovu:614: na hi yad yena niyatamavagatamabādhitaṃ ca tadanyathā bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:615: avāntarajātibhedāttu śaktisadasadbhāvakṛtā kāryavyavastheti na kvacid vyabhicāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:623: idamev cāgnau darśanamanagnau cādarśanamanupapadyamānamagninā niyamaṃ pratipādayati /
GSP28mimslovu:626: na hi yadekatra bhavati tenānyatra na bhavitavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:632: tatra satāpyanyatrāpi na bhavitavyameveti kimatra pramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:633: ato darśanādarśanasahakṛtendriyasyaiva vastusvabhāvāvadhāraṇamaparokṣaṃ jāyata ityevaṃ samarthanīyam /
GSP28mimslovu:637: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadā yatra dhūmastadā tatrāgniriti /
GSP28mimslovu:645: sannihitāvāntarasambandho na pratyakṣa iti tadrūpamapratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:646: apratyakṣe hi tasmin nedaṃ rajatamiti sūrvānubhūtarajatabādho na syād,
GSP28mimslovu:648: svakāle hi pūrvavijñānena rajataṃ viṣayīkṛtaṃ na bhaviṣyadvādhakajñānakṣaṇa iti kathaṃ tatrāprasaktaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:649: kālāntarasambdho 'pi tena rūpeṇa pūrvajñānāvadhāritaṃ bhaviṣyajjñānakālamapi vyāptotīti bhavati samānaviṣayatāmāsādya bādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:652: na ca dhūmasyāgṛhītapratisambandhinā tadrūpamavagamyata iti kathaṃ vasturūpatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:659: ato yadetadagninā dhūmasya niyatvaṃ bhāvātmakamidaṃ tatpratyakṣeṇāvagamyata iti kimanupapannam /
GSP28mimslovu:661: vipakṣavyāvṛttyā tu vidhirūpa eva niyama' parīkṣakairvyākhyāya parebhya' pratipādyate /
GSP28mimslovu:663: nanu niyamyatvamapi karmakārakatvaṃ tacca śaktirūpaṃ kathaṃ pratyakṣam / na /
GSP28mimslovu:670: āgamikeṣu cārtheṣu tasya tasya phalasya tena tena vedavedyen karmaṇā samanvayāt,
GSP28mimslovu:671: karmāntarānvayasya cānavagamād anenaiva karmaṇedaṃ phalaṃ vyāptamiti śāstrādadagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:676: tacca rūpamubhayasyāpi pratyakṣasamadhigamyameveti tadeva tatra vyāptipramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:678: bhavatu tāvadanyad vyākhyāsyāma iti samadhigataṃ tāvad vyāpte' svarūpaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca /
GSP28mimslovu:692: yatra hi kṛttikodayaṃ dṛṣṭvā rohiṇyāsatti' kathyate- anantaramudeṣyati rohiṇīti,
GSP28mimslovu:701: asti khalvasau hiṃsātvasyādharmatvena bāhyahiṃsāsvityata' kratāvapi hiṃsātvādadharmatvamanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:703: vyāpteśca dṛśyamānāyā' kaścid dharma' prayojaka' // Msv_5,4.13 //
GSP28mimslovu:707: ye tu tānapi visrabdhaṃ sādhyasiddhai prayuñjate // Msv_5,4.15 //
GSP28mimslovu:719: evaṃ ca yadyapi bāhyahiṃsāsu hiṃsātvādharmatvayo' sāhityamavagataṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:723: ato ya evāsmin satyevāsya bhavituṃ śaktirasti ityanena rūpeṇa nirūpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:732: prayojake hi hetāvevañjātīyakā doṣā nāspadaṃ labhante /
GSP28mimslovu:736: yathā viśvāso bhavati tathā prayuñjata ityartha' //15//
GSP28mimslovu:761: na hi sarvavijñānāni mithyetyevaṃvidhaṃ vivādaṃ lokikā' sahante /
GSP28mimslovu:768: santi khalu svargakāmo yajetetyevaṃ vihitāni somādīni karmāṇi /
GSP28mimslovu:775: catvāro 'pi hi varṇā' svargaṃ kāmayantara iti svargakāmapadenābhidhīyante /
GSP28mimslovu:776: svargakāmaścātrādhikāritayā jñāyata iti prāpte uktam-- apaśūdrāṇāmadhikāra iti /
GSP28mimslovu:783: na cāniyamenaiva te śūdrasyāpi bhaviṣyata' iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:784: ko hi pratilabdhavidyāgnisambandhastraivarṇikādhikārasampāditāsu kāmaśrutiṣu niyatakālayovasthamupanayanamādhānaṃ vā jaghanyavarṇasyopakalpayitumutsahate
GSP28mimslovu:787: tad yadi kaścadanumānakuśala' prayuṅkte śūdrakṛto yāga' svargahetu' manuṣyakṛtatvāt traivarṇikācaritayāgavaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:796: iha tu śūdrakṛtasya yāgāde' svargahetutā na sākṣādāgamena pratikṣipyate /
GSP28mimslovu:799: prayatnānantarajñānasadṛśā' pratyayānavasthānādayo 'bhimatā' tai' śabdagocaraistasya vināśitā na prayujyate /
GSP28mimslovu:801: na ca kṛtakatvameva prayatnānantaradarśanena sādhayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:805: śabdānityatvasiddhyarthaṃ ko vaded yo na tārkika' /
GSP28mimslovu:806: tasmād ya eva yasyārtho dṛṣṭa' sādhanaśaktita' // Msv_5,4.22 //
GSP28mimslovu:807: sa eva gamakastasya na prasaṅgānvito 'pi ya' /
GSP28mimslovu:825: ayamartha'--- ya eva niṣiddhatvādirartho yasyādharmatvade' sādhanaśaktiyuktatvenāvagata' /
GSP28mimslovu:826: asmin satyamunā bhavitavyamitīdṛśyā śaktyāvadhāryata iti yāvat /
GSP28mimslovu:830: niyamya eva gamako na prasaṅgānvito hiṃsātvādi' /
GSP28mimslovu:831: niṣiddhatvenānvetumabhipravṛttenādharmatvena prasaṅgāddhi hiṃsātvamapyanvitamiti prasaṅgānvitaṃ hiṃsātvaṃ nādharmatvasya gamakaṃ bhavatīti //22//
GSP28mimslovu:841: sa eva cobhayātmāyaṃ gamyo gamaka eva vā // Msv_5,4.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:847: yadyapi svaśabdena naikadeśyupāttastathāpyekadeśaśabdābhyāmevārthādākṣipyata iti na nyūnatvadoṣa iti //23//
GSP28mimslovu:851: na hyagnyaikadeśo dhūma iti kasyacit pratipattirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:854: ata ekadeśatvānupapattyaiva tadāśraya' kaścidekadeśyavagamyata iti siddhamiti //23//
GSP28mimslovu:857: ata' kvacidev dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā kvacidekadeśyantare 'numānaṃ na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:862: tasya hi tau nāma vakṣyamāṇātmānau sta',
GSP28mimslovu:868: pramātṛpakṣe 'pi pabrathamoccaritenaikadeśaśabdena svāśraya ekadeśinyākṣipte dvitīyāpekṣākṣaṇe 'pi sa eva buddhau viparivartamānastadāśrayatvenāvagamyate nānya' /
GSP28mimslovu:871: yathā devadattasyaikakatra kare kaṅkaṇamaṅgulīyakaṃ karāntara iti na bhinna' karāśrahayo 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:875: ātta' pṛthagabhinno vā prayoktṝṇāṃ vivakṣayā // Msv_5,4.25 //
GSP28mimslovu:882: sa tu dhūmavadādinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣasiddho 'gnimadādinā cāsiddha iti dvyātmakatvādubhayopapattiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:887: ata' punarapi nyūnatvamityata āha--- ātta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:895: ekadeśī gamyo gamako bhedābhedābhyāmupātto iti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:896: kiyati punaranumānasya vyāpāra iti bhavati saṃśaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:912: na dharmamātraṃ siddhatvāt tathā dharmī tathobhayam /
GSP28mimslovu:913: vyastaṃ vāpi samastaṃ vā svātantryeṇānumīyate // Msv_5,4.28 //
GSP28mimslovu:915: dvayaṃ ca na syādiṣṭaṃ sat pakṣeṣveṣu yathākramam // Msv_5,4.29 //
GSP28mimslovu:925: asatyapi sāmānye kenacidekenopādhinānantānāmapi bhāvānāṃ sambandho gṛhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:932: evameva dharmimātrānumāne svatantrobhayānumāne vā siddhasādhyatā darśayitavyetyāha--- tatheti //28//
GSP28mimslovu:940: na cānityatvākhyasya dharmasya svatantrapakṣīkṛtasya kṛtakatvaṃ dharma iti kathamapakṣadharmo liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:941: evaṃ dhvanimātre 'pi svatantre kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatra dhvaniriti niyama' sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:942: tathobhayasya dhvanyanitayatvātmakasyobhayena pakṣadharmatvānugamātmakena na sambandha ityanāgataṃ sambandhaśabdaṃ pūrvāparābhyāṃ sambandhya tantreṇa vyākhyā kartavyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:943: samadhigataṃ tāvad dharmadharmyubhayeṣāṃ vyastasamastānāṃ na sādhyatvamiti //30//
GSP28mimslovu:944: atha kasmād dharmadharmisambandha eva sādhyo na bhavatītyata āha--sambandhaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:946: khalu parīkṣaka' sādhanavākye samnabdhavācinā kenacinnāmnā ṣaṣṭhyā vā sambandha upādīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:958: bhavati tu yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimāniti deśa eva nidarśanaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:961: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- na sādhanavākye sambandha' sādhyatayopādīyate nāpi dṛṣṭāntatayā dirdiśyate na cāyathāpratibhāsaṃ parīkṣakāṇāṃ vaktumucitamiti
GSP28mimslovu:966: api cāyaṃ sambandha' sādhyamāna' sanmātratayā vā sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:972: kananvasati sambandhe viśiṣṭa eva sādhayituṃ na śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:974: yadasambandhyamāna evāgninā parvatastadviśiṣṭo bhavatītyata āha---- tasmāditi vyāntena /
GSP28mimslovu:975: na(nu) satyamasati sambandhe viśiṣṭo na bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:977: viśiṣṭasādhyatvānyathānupapattyaiva tvarthagṛhītā matubarthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā na puna' svatantrasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:983: yathā daṇḍyādiśabdato viśiṣṭārthapratītau satyāṃ sambandho nāntarīyako bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:991: 'prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta' prādhānyena' iti smṛte' /
GSP28mimslovu:994: ata' sambandhavacanā eva daṇḍyādiśabdā iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:995: api ca 'nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirutpadyata' iti viśiṣṭābhidhitsāyāmavaśyambhāvi
GSP28mimslovu:996: prathamataraṃ viśeṣaṇābhidhānamāpatati tata eva viśiṣṭāvagāhasiddherna tadyāvacchabdasyābhidhānaśaktirupakalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1005: tathā sati tanniṣkarṣe daṇḍitvaṃ daṇḍiteti tvataloranuśāsanamupapadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1006: yathā gośabdābhidheyaṃ sāmānyaṃ gotvamiti tvapratyayena niṣkṛṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1007: ata' sambandha eva daṇḍyādiśabdānāmabhidheya iti sāmprataṃ kathamucyate nāntarīyaka' sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1008: atrābhidhīyate--- na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhavācyatvamadhyavasātuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1012: yathā citraguriti citrābhirgobhirviśiṣṭo devadattādireva vṛttau pradhānatayāvagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1013: vigrahe tu citrā gāvo yasyeti gavāmeva
GSP28mimslovu:1018: syeti vigrahe sambandha' pradhānatayā ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭa',
GSP28mimslovu:1021: gomacchabdo hi puruṣapradhāno bhāsate na sambandhapradhāna' /
GSP28mimslovu:1024: tāvatā ca tadartha' pradhānatayā vācyatvena nirdiṣṭa iti bhrāntirupajāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1025: ato na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhasya vācyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:1033: nirbhāgaśabdeṣu hi gavādiṣu viśiṣṭapratītāvapi viśeṣaṇamātramabhidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1043: nanvasati sambandhe daṇḍoviśeṣṭumeva naraṃ na śaknoti /
GSP28mimslovu:1046: na hi pṛthivyāmanavasthitā gāvo na tadvantaṃ viśiṣantīti pṛthivyapyabhidhīyata iti yuktamabhidhātum /
GSP28mimslovu:1053: api tarhi abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvādi'ti tvabhidheyāniṣkarṣārthameva smaraṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:1055: ata' prāk pratīte ekanimittasambandhiviśiṣṭe 'parasmin sambandhinyabhihiter'thagṛhīta' sambandho nābhidheyapakṣe nikṣipyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1065: sarvathā hi dharmamātre dharmaṇi vā svatantre pramīyamāṇe siddhasādhyatādidoṣo bhavati kana viśiṣṭapramāyām /
GSP28mimslovu:1066: viśiṣṭatā tu kadācit kasyacid yathābhiprāyaṃ bhavatu nāma,
GSP28mimslovu:1068: sarvathā tāvat dharmiṇa eva parvatāderagnyādidharmastaddharmeṇaiva dhūmādināvagantavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1073: tatrāsambhavata' paścāt kalpyo 'sau dharmiṇā saha // Msv_5,4.37 //
GSP28mimslovu:1077: ayamabhiprāya'--- laukikāni hi pramāṇāni lakṣaṇakārairapi yathālokamevānugantavyāni /
GSP28mimslovu:1081: tathā svayamanumānena pratipannimarthaṃ tenaiva paraṃ pratipādayanto laukikā dharmaṇā viśiṣṭameva hetuṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante,
GSP28mimslovu:1084: viśeṣaṇatayā hi parvataviśiṣṭo 'gniriti dharmiṇyupātte dhūmavattvāditi hetudharmeṇa tasya sambandho na sphuṭaṃ prakāśate /
GSP28mimslovu:1089: yat svayamapi dharmaviśiṣṭameva dharmiṇaṃ budhyate na viparītamiti // 36 //
GSP28mimslovu:1090: yadi tarhi dharmiṇo hetudharmeṇa sambandho na sphuṭa' kena tarhi prasajyata ityata āha--pradhānatvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1091: dhvaniviśiṣṭamanityatvaṃ kṛtakatvādityucyamāne 'nityatvākhyena dharmeṇaiva sādhyatayā pradhānabhūtena kṛtakatvādihetu' sambadhyeta na dhvaninā guṇabhūtena /
GSP28mimslovu:1096: bhedopāttasya dharmasya guṇabhāvo na duṣyati // Msv_5,4.38 //
GSP28mimslovu:1102: satyaṃ pradhānatayā dharmeṇa heto' sambandho vākyādavagamyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1103: liṅgabalīyastvena tu vākyaṃ bādhitvā dharmiṇaiva sambandha' kalpayiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1104: hetudharmasya hi dharmiṇaiva sambandhayogyatā na dharmeṇa,
GSP28mimslovu:1105: ato dharmasambandhābhāvād dharmiṇaiva sambandho bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- tatreti /
GSP28mimslovu:1111: na caivaṃ prayoktāra' prayuñjānā dṛśyanta ityabhiprāyeṇāha---dhvaneriti /
GSP28mimslovu:1112: yastu vadati dharmiṇyapi viśeṣṭe sādhye 'nvayopadarśanavelāyāṃ yatra yatra kṛtakatvamityukte
GSP28mimslovu:1113: dhvanireva pradhānatayā sambadhyeta nānityatvaṃ guṇabhūtatvādititaṃ pratyāha---anvayasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1115: yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrānityatvamiti na tatra pradhānasambandhāśaṅkā /
GSP28mimslovu:1116: ata' pratijñāvasthāyāṃ dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhyamāne yoguṇabhāva āsīt nāsau dṛṣṭāntavākye duṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1119: yastu vadati ṣaṣṭhyantena dhvaninānityatvaṃ viśeṣyate dhvaneranityatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1120: evaṃ ca kṛtakatvādityasyāvipariṇatavibhaktikena dhvaninaiva sambandha' sphuṭo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1126: ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe hi sambandha eva sādhyo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1131: yo 'gni' so 'sti kvaciddeśe yo dṛṣṭo yatra tatra vā /
GSP28mimslovu:1132: agni' pūrvānubhūto vā deśamātreṇa saṅgata' // Msv_5,4.40 //
GSP28mimslovu:1133: yo 'gni' so 'nena yukto vā yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thavā /
GSP28mimslovu:1134: yo 'yaṃ sa deśamātreṇa yukta' pūrveṇa vāpyayam // Msv_5,4.41 //
GSP28mimslovu:1136: pūrvayo' siddhasādhyatvaṃ pareṣu syād viruddhatā // Msv_5,4.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:1138: nāpi pūrvasya nāpyeṣa vahni' sarvairviśeṣyate // Msv_5,4.43 //
GSP28mimslovu:1151: dṛṣṭapūrvo 'pi pūrvadeśādhikaraṇa' siddha eva kiṃ tat pra(sā)dhānena /
GSP28mimslovu:1152: pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇāntaravirodha ityāha--- iha tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:1155: yattāvat yo 'gni' so 'nena yukta ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1156: nahyanena deśena sarvāgnayo vyāpyante deśasyāvaibhavāt sarvāgnīnāṃ cātrāsannidhānāt,
GSP28mimslovu:1158: deśai' pūrveṇa vāpyasya na deśena viśeṣyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:1161: agne' pūrvataraṃ cātra deśa evāvadhāryate // Msv_5,4.45 //
GSP28mimslovu:1164: yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thaveti yaduktaṃ dūṣayati---nāpi pūrvasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1167: na hyeṣa pura'sthito vahni' sarvairdeśairviśeṣyate sarvatra tasyābhāvāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1172: pūrvānubhūtasya tvagnerdeśamātreṇa sambandha' pura'sthitavahne' sarvadeśasambandhanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛta iti na pṛthagupanyasya dūṣita iti //43//
GSP28mimslovu:1173: evaṃ saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣvaṣṭama' pakṣo 'vaśiṣyate etaddeśaviśiṣṭo vā yo 'yamagniriti tannirākaroti--- etaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1174: ayaṃ pura'sthito 'gniranena deśena viśiṣṭa' sādhyata iti sa vaktavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1175: svadeśakālavartyeva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛta' kathamasāvanena deśena viśeṣṭuṃ śakya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1177: anavacchinnasmṛtāvapi ca dharmo dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇamiti nedaṃ yuktisādhyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1179: deśa eva tu pūrvāvagato viśeṣyatāmarhatītyabhiprāyeṇāha--- agneriti //44-45//
GSP28mimslovu:1180: yadi cāgnirviśeṣyo bhavet tatastasyaivāyamādyo jñānakālo bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:1185: agnerjñānakāle hi sa eva deśo buddha',
GSP28mimslovu:1188: tasmāt dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇa' syāt prameyatā // Msv_5,4.47 //
GSP28mimslovu:1190: nanu śabdavadeva syāt liṅgagamyaṃ viśeṣaṇam // Msv_5,4.48 //
GSP28mimslovu:1194: pramitaṃ hi vastvapramitena dharmeṇa pramitsitaṃ bhavati kakīdṛgdharmo 'yamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1195: tathā cadeśa iti sa eva pramitsyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1198: nanu deśo 'pi pratyakṣāvagata eveti kakathamasāvanumānasyaviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- deśasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1200: anumānena tu pāvakādiviśiṣṭatā tasyānumīyata iti na gṛhītagrāhitvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1201: ato dharmyeva dharmaviśiṣṭa' prameya' na dharmo dharmiviśiṣṭa ityāha---tasmāditi //46-47//
GSP28mimslovu:1213: śabdo hi viśeṣaṇamātra eva vartata ityākṛtyadhikaraṇe vakṣyata iti //48//
GSP28mimslovu:1218: tad yāvataiva pratibaddhamavagataṃ dhūmavattvaṃ pratibaddhamavagatamityagnimattvamevānumāpayatīti na kaścit doṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1225: prameyadhī' pramāṇaṃ hi bhāṣyakārastu manyate // Msv_5,4.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:1226: na ceti viśeṣyo 'pi parvātadisvarūpeṇāvadhārita' so 'pi nānumeya ityāhaviśeṣya iti //49//
GSP28mimslovu:1234: tatra viśiṣātmanā pakṣīkṛtasya sāmānyatmanā hetutvamiti na pakṣaikadeśateti /
GSP28mimslovu:1239: ata eva bhikṣuṇā ekameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalarūpamiti pratyakṣamuktvā tadevānumāne 'pyatidiṣṭaṃ pūrvavat phalamasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1248: yathā hīndriyādipramāṇapakṣe yatra phalaṃ niṣpadyate tadviṣayavyāpārāt samānaviṣayatvamupapāditam /
GSP28mimslovu:1250: ato dhūmastajjñānaṃ vā sambandhastatsmaraṇaṃ vā pramāṇamastu,
GSP28mimslovu:1258: bhāṣyakāro hi buddhireva pramāṇamiti darśayati yat kāraṇamasannikṛṣṭer'the buddhiriti vadati /
GSP28mimslovu:1263: astu vā sajātīyameva phalaṃ hānādibuddhi' phalaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1270: bhāṣyakāreṇāpi buddhirvā janma vetyādinā pratyakṣaniyamaṃ darśayatā sarvatraivāniyamastulyayā darśita eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1272: tañcedamanumānaṃ dvedhā bauddhā vibhajante svārthaṃ parārthañceti /
GSP28mimslovu:1279: tenaivānumānena pratipādanaṃ vāñchatā yathā pūrvamasmābhi' pratipādita' pakṣo viśiṣṭo
GSP28mimslovu:1282: svayamanumānena gṛhītamarthaṃ paraṃ pratipādayituṃ sādhanavākyameva prayujyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1283: parastu tato vākyāt trirūpaṃ liṅgamanusandhāya svayameva sādhyaṃ vastu budhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1296: tata' pratyakṣapratipannamapyarthaṃ bodayad vaca' parārthamiti pratyakṣamapi parārthamāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1297: yadi tu svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya tasya cāśabdagocaratvānna pratyakṣaṃ parārthāmityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1299: evaṃ hi pratyakṣagṛhītārthaviparītābhidhāyināṃ tadvirodhodbhāvanavacanaṃ na yujyate //
GSP28mimslovu:1300: yo hi pratyakṣavirūddhamarthaṃ pratijānīte nāgnirūpaṣṇa iti,
GSP28mimslovu:1301: sa vacanena taṃ pratyakṣaviṣayamarthaṃ pratipādya nirākriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1304: evaṃ ca pratyakṣaviṣayavacanaparārthatayā ka' pratyakṣaparārthatāṃ vārayatīti dvaividhyānupapatti' /
GSP28mimslovu:1305: ato yathodita' pakṣa eva vācya ityuktavān /
GSP28mimslovu:1306: idaṃ tu vaktavyam---- ko 'yaṃ pakṣo nāma,
GSP28mimslovu:1313: ata' sādhya' pakṣa ityācakṣmaha iti vācya' pakṣa ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1329: ato yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ śabdaśca kṛtaka ityudāharaṇopanayamātrādeva sādhyasiddheranarthikā pratijñā /
GSP28mimslovu:1331: tacca dṛṣṭāntadvayenopanayena ca kathyata iti kṛtamativistareṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:1335: yo hi manyate--- yadā khalvayaṃ śabdo nitya iti pratijānīte tadetaro 'nityavādī vyutthito bhavati tato jalpa' pravartata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1338: yo hi manyate---yadā khalvayaṃ śabdo nitya iti pratijānite tadetaro 'nityavādī vyutthito bhavati tato jalpa' pravartata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1345: ato hetuśaktimeva pratipādya tattvaṃ bodhyata iti yuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:1350: tatraitat syāt--- jalpe khalu vivādamājihīrṣu' pratijñāṃ praṇayatīti,
GSP28mimslovu:1353: asatyapi hi pakṣavacane lakṣyata eva yathā dhvanimanityamanuminotīti,
GSP28mimslovu:1354: yat kāraṇaṃ yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭa ityuktvā kṛtakatvaṃ dhvanerupanayati śabdaśca kṛtaka iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1356: vitaṇḍā tu yathā tathā vāde darśite pravartata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1357: na hi vaitaṇḍikasya kiñcit paranigrahādanyad sādhyamasti /
GSP28mimslovu:1358: yadasau pratijñāvacanena kvacidarthe sādhyamāne svaviparītasiddhiṃ manvāno jātodvego vivadet /
GSP28mimslovu:1361: svayaṃ ca kutaściddhetuviśeṣāt kiñcit kenacid dharmeṇa viśiṣṭamavagatamiti parasmā api tathaiva kathyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1362: asatyāṃ tu pratijñāyāmanāśrayahetvādaya ākāśapatitā iva bhaveyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1363: nanu nāyaṃ pakṣavacanapura'saramajñāsītsādhyamiti kathaṃ parasmai tathā kathayati /
GSP28mimslovu:1365: yadyapi śabdo 'nitya iti svapratipattau noccāritaṃ tathāpi savikalpakatvādasyā buddherastyevātra pramāturviśiṣṭo vikalpa',
GSP28mimslovu:1366: uccāraṇaṃ tu parārthamiti tanmātraṃ svapratipattau nāsīt /
GSP28mimslovu:1367: parastu nānuccāritena śabdena pratipādayituṃ śakyata ityuccārya pratipādyata iti śabdoccāraṇamātramadhikam /
GSP28mimslovu:1371: jalpavitaṇḍe hi vijigīṣamāṇayordvayo' pravartata iti paraṃ bhrāmayituṃ pratijñāvacanaṃ na prayujyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1372: avivāde tu śiṣyo na vyāmohanīya iti viśadatarameva pratijñā
GSP28mimslovu:1379: uktamidamasati hi pratijñāvacane 'nāśrayā hetvādayo na pravarteranniti /
GSP28mimslovu:1382: nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ hetu' sambadhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1387: punaśca śabda' kṛtaka iti śabdasya kṛtakatayā sambandho 'nūdita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1390: kṛtakaṃ tāvadanityaṃ śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti svarūpanuvādamātramubhayoriti śaṅkā jāyeta,
GSP28mimslovu:1393: tadatra sarve kṛtakā' śabdātmāna iti sādhusampāditamāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1394: ata' pradhānavākyāvayavapratijñā yadapahanuyate tannāstikānāmeva sarvāpalāpavādināṃ śobhate netareṣām /
GSP28mimslovu:1399: iti sūkto vādivacanaprakāro dharmiṇamuddiśya sādhyadharmo vidhīyata iti //53-54//
GSP28mimslovu:1400: nanvevaṃ sādhyaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vidhīyamāne kevalasādhyānvayāvagamād dharmāntaravyudāso bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1401: tataścānitya' śabda ityukte nitya evetyavadhāraṇādambaraguṇatvādayo 'pi taddharmā na bhaveyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1402: evaṃ ca hetorapi pratikṣepāt sādhyasiddhirapi durlabhaiva /
GSP28mimslovu:1405: satyam, ata eva tannivṛttyarthamavadhāraṇe kriyamāṇe itaranivṛttirapi bhavedata āha--- niyama iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1410: yathā śukla' paṭa ityukte tadvirodhinastadabhāvasyaiva nivṛttirbhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:1429: smṛtihetustu prācīnāmubhavaprabhāvitā bhāvanā samastīti smṛtireva pramuṣitatadavamarśā setyāśritam /
GSP28mimslovu:1430: idaṃ tu pratyutpannaliṅgādikāraṇabalādutpadyamānaṃ laiṅgikajñānamanubhavākārapravṛtaṃ na tadbhāvādutārayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1455: pramitasya pramāṇe hi nāpekṣā jāyate puna' // Msv_5,4.56 //
GSP28mimslovu:1460: asyārtha'--- dvedhā hi sannikṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadrūpapramitaṃ viparītanirūpitaṃ vā /
GSP28mimslovu:1464: sa ca sakṛtpramāṇavyāpārādeva siddha iti na pramāṇāntarāpekṣeti //55,56//
GSP28mimslovu:1465: kiṃ puna' pramitasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣā na jāyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1467: varṇitamidaṃ ---dvedhā hi pramitaṃ bhavati tādrūpyeṇa vaiparītyeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:1468: tatra tāvat tādrūpyaparicchede na paraṃ pramāṇaṃ phalavat /
GSP28mimslovu:1484: pūrvaṃ hi dhūmavattvopalakṣitena rūpeṇāgnimattayā deśo nirjñāta' /
GSP28mimslovu:1490: mūle tasya hyanutpanne pūrveṇa viṣayo hṛta' /
GSP28mimslovu:1493: agrāhyatā tu śabdāde' pratyakṣeṇa viridhyate // Msv_5,4.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:1512: tadyāvaduttaraṃ tattadvyāpāravyagratayā vilambate tāvacchīghrabhāvinā pūrveṇa viṣayāpahārād
GSP28mimslovu:1513: viprakṛṣṭasādhanasyotpattireva nirudhyata ityanantarameva vakṣyata iti kathaṃ punaranumānaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1514: tadapi hi pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa bādhituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1518: yadi bādhādevetarāśrayaṃ tarhyastu vā jyeṣṭhapramāṇena pratyakṣeṇānumānabādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1520: tat kasya heto' ata āha---pratyakṣāderiti syādantena /
GSP28mimslovu:1523: tad yatra kasyacidarthasya kenacidātmanāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati tatra tenotpannasyotpatsyamānasya vā jñānasya bādho 'bhidhīyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1526: tatra hi pūrvopamardanenaivottaramātmānaṃ labhata iti tat tasya bādhakam /
GSP28mimslovu:1527: uttaraṃ ca deśādibhede 'pyabādhitaṃ svabhāvataśca pramāṇaṃ pūrvamābhāsīkaroti /
GSP28mimslovu:1532: tadevamātmanā jñānena pūrvamābhāsīkṛtamiti tatrābhāsa eva bādhyata iti nātiprasaṅga' /
GSP28mimslovu:1533: aprāptabādhe tu yāvat kliṣṭasādhanamanumānaṃ svagocare sāmānyaśāstraṃ vā kvacid viśeṣaviṣaye
GSP28mimslovu:1534: pravartitumārabhate tāvat pratyakṣeṇānumānena vā siddhasarvāṅgakenāgamena vā viśeṣaviṣayeṇa
GSP28mimslovu:1537: na hi balavatā śīghrabhāvinā pramāṇena niruddhamukhamutpattumarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:1538: tadevamaprāptabādhe paramanutpannameva prāptisambhāvanayā tu bādhyata ityucyate śrutyeva liṅgamiti na kvacit pramāṇabādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1539: yattu jaghanyena mukhyabādho na yukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1542: yadeva tu śīghrabhāvi pūrvopamardena vātmānaṃ labhate tadeva bādhakamabhidadhmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:1543: itarañca bādhyamata eva tenaiva tasya bādhaṃ brūma' /
GSP28mimslovu:1544: prāptabādha iva pratyakṣasya tenaivānumānena ca siddhāṅgakena sādhyāṅgakasya viśeṣaśāstreṇa sāmānyaśāstrasya /
GSP28mimslovu:1550: nanu ca balavatāpi nāvaśyaṃ durbalaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1552: ato viṣayavyavasthāyā vikalpena samuccayena vobhayamupapādayiṣyate vinātyantikabodhāśrayaṇena (?)
GSP28mimslovu:1575: ata eva hyaśrāvaṇatāpakṣo 'pi na pratyakṣeṇa virudhyata iti vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1586: tadanena prakāreṇa śabdābhāvapakṣasyaiva pratyakṣavirodha upadiṣṭa iti na kiñcidanupapannamiti //58,59//
GSP28mimslovu:1588: teṣāmeva śabdādīnāmaśrāvaṇatvādyanumānaviruddhaṃ yo hyaśrāṇamanityaṃ vā śabdaṃ pakṣamicchati tasyāsau śīghrabhāvinā viparyayānumānena bādhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1591: śabdo hi pratyakṣa' na tacchrāvaṇatā grāhyagrāhakasambandho hi śabdasya śrāvaṇasya ca tvatalbhyāmucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1596: na hyaindriyānaindriyādhāra' sambandha' pratyakṣo bhavati vāyuvanaspatyoriva /
GSP28mimslovu:1601: tathāhi śrotropaghātamātreṇa cakṣurādimato badhirasya śabdabuddhirna dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1602: śrotre ca dṛḍhe cakṣurādiṣvasambhave 'pi śabdagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimslovu:1607: ato mānasapratyakṣa evāyamiti kaścit bhrāmyati sa vaktavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1615: paśyāmo hi vayaṃ kumbhakāravyāpārānantaraṃ kumbhasambhavamudīkṣamāṇā' kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ cakṣuṣaiva /
GSP28mimslovu:1616: idaṃ hi kumbhasya tatkāryatvaṃ yā tadanantarasambhūti' /
GSP28mimslovu:1617: sa ca kumbhastatsambhavaścobhayaṃ cākṣuṣameveti kimatra manasā /
GSP28mimslovu:1621: evaṃ ca prayoga'--- śravaṇapramāṇaprakāśya' śabda' tasmin
GSP28mimslovu:1623: yadevaṃ tattataprakāśyaṃ santamasa iva ghaṭa' pradīpaprakāśya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1627: tāvacchīghrajanamanā śrāvaṇatvānumānena vyāptisaṃvidaṃ pratibandhatā tasyotpattireva nirudhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1629: yat kṛtakatvādihetukaṃ tadapyasiddhivyabhicārādidoṣānna śīgharmupajāyata iti siddhāvayavai' śīghrajanmabhirnityatvānumānairbādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1630: yathā deśakālādibhinnā gośabdabuddhaya' samānaviṣayā' gaurityatpadyamānatvāt sampratyutpannagośabdabuddhivad hyastanoccārito vā gośabdo 'dyāpyasti
GSP28mimslovu:1633: pratijñāvirodhādayo hi śabdavirodhatayā prasiddhā iti te tathābhidhīyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1635: yatra hi kvacidarthe pratiṣṭhitena śabdena pratijñāntaraṃ bādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1637: na ca svavāgvirodhe śabdasya kvacidarthe pratiṣṭhāsti vyāhatābhidhānāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1642: dharmyuktyāhaṃ yato jāta' sā vandhyā jananī mama // Msv_5,4.63 //
GSP28mimslovu:1645: lokaṃ prasiddhistu na śabdo na pramāṇāntaram /
GSP28mimslovu:1646: api tu pratyakṣādyantargataiveti tadviruddhapakṣapradarśanenaiva pradarśiteti na śabdavirodhe 'ntarabhāvayitumucitā /
GSP28mimslovu:1648: na hi candraśabdaśaśāṅkayo' sambandhaṃ śabdo vadati yenātadvācyapakṣasya śabdavirodho bhavati sambandhavācyatve hītaretarāśrayaṃ bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1655: tatra pratijñāvirodha evaikastridhā bhidyata ityāha--- yāvaditi sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:1664: sarvamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanamapi mṛṣeti netaranmṛṣā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1665: tadamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanamapi mṛṣeti dharmasaṃsargāsambhavaparāmarśāt pakṣabādha iti dharmoktivirodhābhidhānam /
GSP28mimslovu:1669: dharma evāyamukta ātmānaṃ bādhata iti yāvat /
GSP28mimslovu:1670: vandhyā me jananīti pakṣo dharmyuktyā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1679: na ca gauṇo jananīśabda ityapi vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1681: evaṃ viśeṣite pakṣe dharmyuktivirodha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1683: na tu śrutismṛtyatirekīṇi jalpākavacanāni gauṇatvādibhi' samīkartuṃ śakyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1686: teṣu kathañcitsamādhīyamāneṣu na kiñcid dūṣaṇaṃ nāma bhavediti //62,63//
GSP28mimslovu:1688: anitya' śabda iti bauddhenokte kathaṃ kṣaṇikādagṛhītasambandhādarthapratyaya ityanuyuktena tenaiva yadā punarucyate nityastarhīti tadā tasya pūrvābhyupagamavirodha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1690: tathāpyevaṃvidhā pūrvāparaviruddhā pratijñaivātmānaṃ na labhata iti na nyāyāvatāramapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:1696: tādṛśa' pūrvāparaviruddha' pakṣaṃ vināśayatīti teṣāmabhiprāya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1698: atrāpi mahājanaviparītārtha' śabdasaṃsarga' svarasādeva bhajyate na pramāṇaṃ yāvadapekṣata iti śabdabādha udāhṛta iti //64//
GSP28mimslovu:1700: yena hi nagare gavākāro dṛṣṭa' samprati cāraṇye gavayākāra',
GSP28mimslovu:1701: taṃ prati gaurgavayasadṛśo na bhavatīti pakṣa upamānena virudhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1719: yadyapi pratyakṣapūrvikodāhṛtaiva tathāpi pakṣadoṣodbhāvanacchalenendriyāpalāpapakṣasyāpyayaṃ doṣa iti vivakṣatā punastadvirodho 'bhihita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1720: atraivādiśabdenopamānapūrvikayā virodho darśayitavya'--- yathā gavayopamitāyā gostajajñānagrāhyaśaktyapahnava iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1722: arthābhidhānānyathānupapattyā hi vācakaśaktimarthāpattyā pramāya punastadanupapattyārthapattyantareṇa śabdanityatvamavagamyata iti //67//
GSP28mimslovu:1726: tathā ca pramāṇāntaravirodheṣu prapañco na darśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1730: ṣoḍhā bhinnereva ṣaḍabhiratra virodho vārtikakārasya vivakṣita',
GSP28mimslovu:1736: svedyamānasya vādino 'nuṣṇo vahniriti pratijñā anubhavasthenaiva pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1737: anāsannagnistu saiva pratijñā smṛtisthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1738: yadā khalvayaṃ vādakāle 'nuṣṇo vahniriti pratijānāti tadainamitara' smārayati kiṃ na smarasi pūrvānubhūtamagneruṣṇatvaṃ yadevamāttheti,
GSP28mimslovu:1739: sa tat smṛtvā tata' pratyakṣānnivartata iti bhavati smṛtapratyakṣabādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1742: śrutapratyakṣabādhastu yatra kenacidarthe kasmiścidapahanute sākṣibhirdṛṣṭo 'yamartha iti sākṣipratyakṣeṇa bādho 'bhidhīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1747: darśanaṃ tu tai' svaśabdena pratyāyyata iti śabdāvagatapratyakṣavirodha evāyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1749: yathā dātrādipratyabhijñāyāṃ yādṛśī svātmaniceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tāṃ paratrāpi dṛṣṭavopaminoti mamevāsyāpi dātrādipratyabhijñā pratyakṣamutpannā,
GSP28mimslovu:1751: iha ca ceṣṭayā tadanurūpaṃ paragocaramanumāya svajñānasādṛśyaṃ tatropamīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1756: yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toyārthiṣu taṭākamekastadāharaṇāya prasthito vilambate tadā tadvilambanānyathānupapattyā tadīyaṃ toyapratyakṣamarthāpattyā pramīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1758: abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti tadanavagataprataykṣavirodho nehodāhriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1762: yatra tu 'devasya tveti nirvapati' iti pratītaviniyogānmantraśeṣe 'numite tadviparīta' pakṣo gṛhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1764: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇāmapacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu 'vrīhibhiryajete'ti codanā nīvāraviṣayatvenānumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1766: na hi tasyā' svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtā',
GSP28mimslovu:1768: te ca nīvāreṣvapi santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī vrīhicodanānumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1771: yatra dūrād vṛkṣābhāvaṃ viditvā tacchāyābhāvo 'numīyate tatrābhāvapūrvakānumānena chāyāsadbhāvapakṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1777: āgamikaśabdabādhastu yatra śākhāntaragataśrutiviṣayavivāde smṛtinibnadhanakārāṇāṃ vacanena śrutisadbhāvo niścīyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1779: upamitaśabdavirodhastu manvādismṛtibhyor'yāpattyā vaidikaṃ kimapi mūlamastīti kalpite smārtavākyasadṛśa eva mūla upamiter'thavādamūlatvapakṣa upamitaśabdena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1780: viśvajidaphalatvapakṣastu śrutārthapattisiddhavadhāraṇe tasya vyāpāra' tatrābhāvāvadhāritavidhikātsnarye jyotiṣṭāmeprākṛtetikartavyatāprāptikṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1783: anumānapūrva kopamānabādhastu yadā hyādityasya deśāntaraprāptyā gatimanumāyatanmadhye
GSP28mimslovu:1784: vānte vā sūryagati' tādṛśī vatsarānteṣviti tatra gitavaisādṛśyapakṣo 'numānapūrvakopamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1785: pūtīkā na somasadṛśā iti tu pakṣa' śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1791: śabdenaiva tu somāṃśujātatvaṃ pūtīkānāṃ pratipādayatā kāryakāraṇayoraucityena sārūpyaṃpratipāditamiti
GSP28mimslovu:1792: śabdāvagatakāryakāramaprabhavatvāt pūtīkānāṃ somasādṛśyopamānasya tadviparyaya' śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1793: jyotiṣṭomikā hi dharmā' satrāhīneṣu na bhavantīti pakṣa upamānopamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1794: jyotiṣṭāmopamānena hi te dvādaśāhaṃ gacchanti dvādaśāhopamānena ca satrāhīnāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:1795: yadā tvātmendriyasādṛśyaviśiṣṭāni parendriyāṇyupamīyante tatra tanniṣedhor'thāpattyupamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1796: vedakāranāstitā śaśaśṛṅgādyabhāvasadṛśī na bhavatīti pakṣo 'bhāvapūrvākopamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1802: yadā tvamuṃ rāśiṃ sūryo gaco na veti cintyamāne gaṇitakuśalena gaṇitānumānābhāvānna gata ityavagate bhrānto gata iti vadati /
GSP28mimslovu:1806: tathā śabde śrotradeśamanāgacchati śrotre ca śabdeśaṃ dhvanāyāgamanamātreṇaiva śabdaśvaṇopapatteryor'thāpatyā
GSP28mimslovu:1807: śabda' śabdāntaramāramate tata' krameṇāntya' śrotreṇa gṛhyate ityanyathānupapattyā
GSP28mimslovu:1809: abhāvābhāvastyevaṃ darśayitavya'--- yadā hi kartrabhāvena vedānāṃ doṣābhāvo 'vagato bhavati tadā doṣavatpakṣasyābhāvābhāvena bādha iti //69//
GSP28mimslovu:1811: dharmadharmyubhayasvarūpasvaviśeṣabādhamata' paraṃ vakṣyāma iti saṃkṣipya sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ śrotṛbuddhisamādhānārthaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:1815: adharmo vihito du'khaṃ koratyalpamitīha tu // Msv_5,4.72 //
GSP28mimslovu:1822: dharmadharmiṇorhi svarūpaṃ yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptaṃ tamākṣipati /
GSP28mimslovu:1825: tatra dharmasvarūpabādho varṇita eveti tamakṛtvaiva tadviviśeṣaṇabādhamudāharati---tṛṇādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:1826: yo hi tṛṇādivikāradarśanādagnimaddhimaṃ sādhayati tasyābhāvena tāvaddharmasvarūpabādho bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:1828: na ca vācyamanuṣṇo 'pi vahni' prabhāsu dṛṣṭa iti kathamarthākṣipto viśeṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1837: dharmiṇastu dvaprakāro 'pi bādho 'nukta eveti ubhayathā tadbādhodāharaṇamāha---adharmaiti sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:1839: tad yadā vihito 'dharmo daikṣapaśuhiṃsadārayid du'khaṃ karotītyanūdyatadalpamiti sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1840: tadāpi vihitatvenādharmataiva bādhyate tadviśeṣo 'pi du'khanimittatvaṃ yadarthākṣiptaṃ tadapi tenaiva bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1841: na hi vihitaṃ nāma kimapi du'khasya nidānaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1852: na cātra śrutyupātta eva svaviśeṣa iti codanīyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1856: yadā hi sarvajñānāni mithyeti sādhyate tadā dharmadharmigrāhiṇorapi jñānayormithyātvāt tadviśeṣaṇagrāhiṇośca mithyātvād bhavatyubhayasyaivobhayabādha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1857: ayaṃ ca dharmoktyobhayabādha iti śabdabādha eva niveśanīya iti samadhigataṃ tāvadubhayo' svarūpabādha iti //74//
GSP28mimslovu:1860: bādhyete iti vipariṇamya sambandho darśayitavya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1864: taddhi liṅgaṃ na punardarśanamato vyākhyeyamekadeśadarśanādityata āha---- darśanāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1871: parārthaprayoge tu ṇijantadarśanapadamekadeśaṃ darśayitvā yā buddhirjāyate sānumānamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1873: anena ca yatraikadeśe vādiprativādinorekasyobhayorvā saṃśayo 'dhīrviparyayo vā bhavati so 'siddhābhidhāno hetvābhāso vyudasyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1874: na hyasau tādṛśa' parasmai daraśayituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1886: yadā vaiśiṣiko yājñikaṃ prati śabdo 'nitya' kṛtakatvāt guṇatvādveti hetuṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimslovu:1888: yadā tu svayamevaṃprakāraṃ hetuṃ paraṃ prati vadati tadā tasyāsiddhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:1890: na hi vaiśiṣikā' śabdaṃ dravyamabhyupagacchanti guṇatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1893: yadā hi dhūmo bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyate dvābhyāmekena vā kiṃsvidayaṃ rajasāmudgamo bāṣpo vā dhūmo veti tadā dvayorapyantatarasya vā sandigdhāsiddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1898: evaṃ tāvat svarūpato heturasiddho bhavatītyuktamityāha--- evamiti //78//
GSP28mimslovu:1900: nanu svarūpāsiddhyāheturduṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kastasya doṣa' ata āha---jñāte 'pīti /
GSP28mimslovu:1906: itarat sādhanaṃ tu syāt vādinā yadi sādhyate // Msv_5,4.82 //
GSP28mimslovu:1910: siddhaṃ hi svarūpeṇa jale śaityaṃ rūparūpirūpapaikārthasamavāyiṣu ca cākṣuṣatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:1911: śabdā(dau) hi pakṣadharmatayā tu tayorasiddhatvamiti taddharmarūpāsiddhavacanam /
GSP28mimslovu:1914: yadā hi boddhaṃ prati sarvatra kāryopalambhādātmana' sarvagatatvaṃ mīmāṃsakā' sādhayanti,
GSP28mimslovu:1917: yastu pramāṇagatimajānāno laukika' kaścidātmani saṃśete tasminneva hetāvucyamāne sadnigdhāśrayo heturityāha--- laukikāderiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1919: ādiśabdena satīrthikānāmapi yeṣāmātmani saṃśaya' ta upādriyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1922: yasya hi pakṣavacana' śabdo na prasiddhastaṃ pratyevañjātīyake hetāvucyamāne 'jñānenāśrayāsiddhiriti //80//
GSP28mimslovu:1924: evaṃ tarhyamūrtatvādātmā niṣkriya ityevamāderapi hetutvaṃ na syāt digambarāṇāmātmano 'mūrtatvāsiddhe' /
GSP28mimslovu:1926: akartṛkatvānnityo veda iti ca bauddhānāṃ tadasiddherahetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1937: tasyaiva tathāviṣayasyāsiddhatāvacanaṃ vādino dūṣaṇaṃ bhavati nāsiddha iti
GSP28mimslovu:1946: yadi vādinā prayuṅkte sādhane prativādinā cāsiddhatva udbhāvite vādinā tatsādhanaṃ sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1948: yadi tuparamārthopapattyābhidhānena prativādinā nirākriyate tatastasya dūṣaṇaṃ sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1955: yadvādinā sattvena jñātaṃ bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparityena,
GSP28mimslovu:1962: sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavatīti //82 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:1966: na hi sādhāraṇa' saṃśayahetu' prameyatvaṃ nityatvena jñātasambandhamiti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28mimslovu:1972: sat sādhye tadabhāve ca dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta eva ca // Msv_5,4.84 //
GSP28mimslovu:1981: tato jñātasambandhasyeti dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api sādhyahetuvikalatvādayo 'nena nirākriyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1982: tadvaikalye 'pi svayaṃ sambandho jñātuṃ parasmai pratipādayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1994: ete ca dharmā' sādhyatadabhāvayo' sādhāraṇā ityartha' //85//
GSP28mimslovu:1995: keṣu puna' sādhyeṣu teṣāṃ sādhāraṇyamata āha---nityeti nityeṣvantena /
GSP28mimslovu:2007: kiṃsvidayaṃ sthāṇurāhosvit puruṣa ityanavadhāraṇajñānātmaka' saṃśayo jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2009: nityānityayo' sāmānyaṃ viditavatastadviśeṣamasmaraṇāpekṣastayorevānirdhāraṇātmaka' pratyaya' saṃśayāparanāmā jāyata iti prameyatvaṃ saṃśayahetu'
GSP28mimslovu:2011: tathā yatnottha' śabda' anityatvādityayamapi sādhāraṇa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2012: ayatnottheṣu keṣucidvidyudādiṣu gatatvādyatnottheṣu ca sarveṣu ghaṭādiṣu vṛtte' /
GSP28mimslovu:2020: amūrtatā hi na sarvanityavyāpinī vyomādiṣu bhāvādaṇuṣu cābhāvādanityamapi na svaṃ vyāpnoti ghaṭakuḍyādiṣvabhāvāt karmādiṣu bhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2021: sarvatra cātra dvayavṛttitvameva heto' saṃśaye kāraṇavṛttyaṃśastu sannapi na kāraṇamityatantram /
GSP28mimslovu:2022: ata eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhāvibhāgaṃ vadanti ye teṣāmasāvanupayogyeva sādhanadūṣaṇayorityupekṣayoravṛttyaṃśa' kvacidupayujyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2023: aṇvāpi hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamāno hetustyājya eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2025: vārtikakāreṇāpi sarvasādhāraṇeṣu dvayavṛttitvameva saṃśayakāraṇamiti darśayitumudāharaṇaprapañco darśita',
GSP28mimslovu:2033: na tāṃ vihāya nityamanityaṃ vā bhāvāntaramāśrayayatītyasādhāraṇa iti gīyata /
GSP28mimslovu:2040: yuktaṃ hi pakṣadvayāvalambī sādhāraṇo dvayoranavasthādhiyamādadhāno yatsaṃśayaheturiti,
GSP28mimslovu:2041: asādhāraṇastu dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtto naikatrāpi dhiyamupajanayitumalāmiti kathamasya saṃśayahetubhāva',
GSP28mimslovu:2043: hetorhi niścayajanane 'nvayavyatirekāvaṅgamanyatarāpāye 'pi na niścayāya hetu' paryāpto bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2044: tad yathā sādharaṇo 'nvayasanātho 'pi vinākṛto vyatirekeṇa na niścayāya prabhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:2045: evamevāsādharaṇo 'pi niścayasyaikenānvayanāmnāṅgena vilastamakurvan saṃśayahetutāṃ pratipadyata iti //86 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2046: nanūktaṃ sādhāraṇo dvayagāmī dvaye buddhiṃ janayan saṃśaye heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2047: asādhāraṇastu na kiñcid jñāpayatīti nāsāvekāṅgavikalatāmātreṇa saṃśayaheturiti yuktamata āha---sādhāraṇaiti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:2050: viruddhe dyubhayasmin pratipādite tayorekatra samavāyasambhavād vyāghātādeva saṃśayo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2052: asādhāraṇo 'pi dyubhayasmād vyāvṛttestadabhāvaṃ gamayan dvayābhāvāsambhavādeva saṃśayaṃ janayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2053: na hi sambhavati nityamanityaṃ ca vastu na bhavatīti,
GSP28mimslovu:2060: ayaṃ cātrāvayavārtha'---yathā prameyatvādi' sādhāraṇo dṛṣṭa' san buddhidvayanimittaka' /
GSP28mimslovu:2063: sādhyatadabhāvaviṣayaṃ hi buddhidvayaṃ nimittīkṛtya viruddhaikānavāptereva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2070: so 'pi hi yatra nitye 'nitye vā nāsti tadabhāvaṃ pratipādya tanmukhena dvayasattvavirodhamāpādayan saṃśayakāraṇaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2072: avyavasthayā hyubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2075: api ca parimiteṣveva bhāveṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:2076: nivṛttimukhena tu saṃśayajanane sarvato nivṛttenāsādhāraṇena sarvatomukha' saṃśayo janyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:2082: agnāvanuvartamāno hi dhūmo dṛṣṭavyatireko 'gniniyatasvabhāvatvenāvagator'thādadṛśyamānebhyo 'vagnibhyo vyatiricyata ityavagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2083: yastu na kenacidanvitastasya kathamanupalabdhiyogyāt sarvato vyatireka' pratīyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:2085: yadi tvasādhāraṇadharmāṇobhāvā nityānityabhāvabhājo dṛṣṭā iti kṣitimapi taddharimikāmupalabhya nityā vā syādanityā veti saṃśayo bhavatītyucyate
GSP28mimslovu:2087: anyo hyasādhāraṇadharma' anyā ca bahusādhāraṇī tadvattā /
GSP28mimslovu:2088: tad yadyasau saṃśayakāraṇaṃ jātā kiṃ jātamasādhāraṇasya /
GSP28mimslovu:2089: hantaivaṃ sādhāraṇa eva saṃśayaheturabhyupagato bhavatīti siddham /
GSP28mimslovu:2100: na hyanavyavasāyo nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāra',
GSP28mimslovu:2117: bhavati hi taddarśina' kīdṛgdharmo 'yamito dharmād bhāvo bhavediti
GSP28mimslovu:2119: yadyapi cāsau śuddhadharmidarśanādapi kadācid bhavatyeva tathāpi dharmadvāreṇāpi tāvad bhavatyeveti na taddhetutvamanupapannam /
GSP28mimslovu:2134: idaṃ ca vārttikakṛtaiva pradeśāntare svayamupanyasya yathoktadūṣaṇairdūṣi tameveti //88//
GSP28mimslovu:2138: amūrtatā hi nityatve sādhye nityānityavyomakarmasādhāraṇī saṃśayaheturāsīdat,
GSP28mimslovu:2139: saiva tu niṣkriyatve sādhye labdhvānvayavyatirekau hetutāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:2148: gandhaviśeṣadarśino hi viditavyāpte' kṣityekadeśasiddhatve bhavatyānumāniko nirṇaya iti //90 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2151: yatra hi na sākṣātkārijñānaviṣayo vāyu' arūpatvādityeka' sādhayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2166: siddhe ca vastuni vikalpāsambhavāt bādhyabādhakabhāvasyāpi tulyakakṣyatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2170: yathā sarvajño 'stīti buddhavacanaṃ samyak taduktatvād kṣaṇabhaṅgādivākyavadityekenokte
GSP28mimslovu:2171: 'para' prabravīti buddho 'sarvajña iti madvacanaṃ samyak maduktatvāt yathā jyotiruṣṇamāpo dravā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2174: ato 'prasiddhāṅgakatvāt pūrva sādhanaṃ balavatā prasiddhāṅgakena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2175: yattu viruddhāvyabhicārī saṃśaye heturiti śākyā vadanti /
GSP28mimslovu:2189: viruddhārthasambandhau saṃśayahetū iti dvivacanāntenaiva nāmnā saṃśayahetubhāvo darśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:2194: imāṃ ca viruddhāvyabhicāritāṃ saṃśayahetuṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇābhyāṃ jātyantarameke varṇayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:2198: atra ca pradeśāntare vārtikakṛtā sādhāraṇya evāsthā darśitā /
GSP28mimslovu:2204: yadi hyekena dvayaṃ prayujyeta tato bhavedapyevaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2205: pratyekamanvitau dṛṣṭau dvābhyāṃ prayuktau nānanvitāviti śakyate vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:2210: yathā hi na dvayamekena prayuktamiti nāsādhāraṇatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:2215: ata eva cātra sādhāraṇād bhedena pratihetu viruddhayo' saṃśayahetutvamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2218: sādhāraṇo hyubhayadṛṣṭastu pratītimādadhāna' saṃśayaheturimau tvekaikaśyenobhayamupasthāpayantau saṃśayahetū iti vārtikakāreṇāpi sādhāraṇapade sthita ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2221: pratijñā yatra bādhyeta pūrvoktairyasya sādhanai' // Msv_5,4.93 //
GSP28mimslovu:2223: kvacit saṃśayahetū yau pratyekatvena lakṣitau // Msv_5,4.94 //
GSP28mimslovu:2228: yathehaiva tāvat udāharaṇe tvagindriyavyāpāreṇa vāyāvaparokṣamanubhūyamāne tenaivānubhavena parokṣatāpakṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2232: na hi prabalena marutābhihanyamānasya jalaṃ vā śliṣyata' saṃvida viśiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2244: 'rudro hi mahāvrataṃ cacāra sa etacchavaśīrṣamupadadhāre'ti tvarthavādamātraṃ na śavaśirodhāraṇavidhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:2245: atra ca pratyakṣādīnyeva yathāsvamarthaṃ sādhayantīti sādhanapadenocyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2247: teṣvapi sāmānyato darśanena bādhasya śaṅkyamānatvādata āha--- bādhavarjanāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2249: kadācid bādhasambhāvanā tu na teṣāṃ prāmāṇyamutsārayīti //93 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2250: atra bhikṣuṇā 'pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto heturityekavacanena vivakṣitaikasaṅkhya eka eva heturiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:2260: viruddhau hi dvābhyāṃ dvāvarthāvekatropaplāvitāviti tatra saṃśerate /
GSP28mimslovu:2266: tadatraikasyaiva saṃśayahetutvaṃ dvābhyāmeva tu nirṇaya ityaprayojakaṃ saṃśayahetutve dvitvaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2268: yathā khalveka eva sādhārama' sapakṣavipakṣayorvartamāna' saṃśayaheturbhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2269: evaṃ viruddhārthasyāpi hetudvayasyāṃśābhyāmubhayavṛttireva saṃśaye kāraṇamiti na taddvitvena hetutvanirākaraṇaṃ yuktamityāha---kvaciditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2274: yastu kākavattāmātreṇa sthāṇuṃ siṣādhayiṣati tasyāsau kevalā saṃśayahetu',
GSP28mimslovu:2276: api ca avirodhino' pratyekaṃ saṃhatayorapi kvacidarthe sādhye hetubhāvo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2278: śakyate hi tābhyāmaikaikaśyena samastābhyāṃ cānumānatvaṃ sādhayitum /
GSP28mimslovu:2279: dvitve ca hetvābhāsatvakāraṇe naikasmin sādhye 'nekahetava' prayujyeran /
GSP28mimslovu:2280: prayoktārastvekameva sādhyaṃ kiñcānyaditaśceti nānāsādhanai' sādhayanto dṛśyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2284: ga atra tu pratyekaṃ gamakāvapi saṃhatau ca gamakāviti pratipāditamiti //95//
GSP28mimslovu:2294: anye tūbhayavirothayo' pratyekapakṣānatirekāt cāturvidhyaṃ pratipannā ityāha--- caturdhā
GSP28mimslovu:2296: vayaṃ tu iṣṭavighātamātreṇaikameva prakāraṃ saṅgirāmaha ityāha--- ekadhāpi veti /
GSP28mimslovu:2298: api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syāditi pakṣabādha eva viruddhatve kāraṇaṃ kimavāntarabhedopanyāseneti /
GSP28mimslovu:2299: triṣvapi ca prakāreṣu śrutyarthopāttasya pratijñātārthasya bādhāyāṃ viruddhatāmāhurityāha--- śrutyārthoktasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2305: tadasmin pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetorviruddhatā bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2307: kathaṃ hi pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne heturviruddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2308: sa hi pratijñārthaṃ pratijñārthena bādhyate yadviruddho bhavet prasiddhatvādasya /
GSP28mimslovu:2312: vārtikakṛtā tu paraprasiddhimātreṇa viruddha ityuktāmiti veditavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2317: na ca viśeṣaṇamanabhidhāya viśiṣṭo 'bhidhātuṃ śakyata iti svarūpameva tāvadādau śabdo
GSP28mimslovu:2326: svarūpaṃ tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandhāvadhāraṇātprāgapi tadavagamāt,
GSP28mimslovu:2330: evaṃ prasādhyānte prayogamāhu'--- śabdasvarūpaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāgarthavad vibhaktisambandhāt,
GSP28mimslovu:2332: yadā ca vibhaktiyoga' tadārthavattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā sambandhagrahaṇāt paścāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2333: kathaṃ punarevaṃ prayujyamāne dharmaviśeṣabādho bhavatyata āha--- svarūpeṇeti cāśrita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2336: evaṃ ca bhavatyarthākṣiptasya dharmaviśeṣasya bādha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2337: kathaṃ puna' svarūpeṇeti cāśrite dharmaviśeṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2342: ator'thavattāyā viśeṣaṃ svasvarūpārthavattvaṃ heturayaṃ viruṇaddhīti bhavati dharmaviśeṣabādha iti //99 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2344: yadā hisamavāyadharmiṇaṃ kṛtvā tasya dravyādivyatireka' sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2345: ihapratyahetutvaṃ ca heturucyate ihāyaṃ ghaṭa iti,
GSP28mimslovu:2352: nityamātmāstitā kaiścid yadā sautrāntikaṃ prati // Msv_5,4.103 //
GSP28mimslovu:2360: ihapratyayahetutvaṃ hyasamavāyātmana eva dṛṣṭamiti tādrūpyaṃ virundhyāditi dharmisvarūpabādha iti //101 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2362: samavāyo hi sattāsāmānyavadekarūpa iti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2363: so 'pyasya viśeṣa' saṃyogavadbhedāpatterbādhyata iti bhavati dharmiviśeṣaviruddho heturiti //102 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2365: yadā kaścit sautrāntikaṃ pratyevaṃ sādhayati--- ātmā nitya' niravayatvāt vyomavaditi,
GSP28mimslovu:2367: sautrāntikasya hyavayavābhāvo vyomnyabhāvenaiva sambaddho 'bhimata ityātmano 'pi tadvadabhāvaṃ gamayeta,
GSP28mimslovu:2370: ato 'navayavatvādātmana' svarūpasya taddharmasya ca nityatvasya bādhādubhayabādha iti //103 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2372: yadā hi parārthāścakṣurādaya' saṅghātatvāt śayanādivaditi sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2381: hikhaṭvādau mahābhūtasaṃhataśarīrapārārthyena saṅghātatvāditi heturvyāpto dṛṣṭa iti saṃhatapārārthyameva sādhayet /
GSP28mimslovu:2384: so 'yaṃ tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yo viśeṣo 'bhimata ātmapārārthyaṃ sa tāvad bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2385: cakṣurāderapi dharmiṇo yo viśeṣa āhaṅkārikatvaṃ nāma so 'pyanenaiva hetunā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2391: tadayamartha'--- saṃhatapārārthyabhautikatvābhyāṃ vyāpto heturyasmin śayane tatrātmapārārthyamasiddhamiti dharmaviśeṣabādhanaṃ tāvad bhavati
GSP28mimslovu:2392: dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi bhautikavayāptyā sūtrito 'nantarameva vivariṣyata iti na kevalamātmapārārthyaṃ na sidhyati,
GSP28mimslovu:2393: asaṃhatarūpātmapārārthye ceṣṭe vyāptibalenātmano 'pi saṃhatatā prāpnotītyāha--- asaṃhateti /
GSP28mimslovu:2415: sādhya' pakṣa' tatsādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ yo dṛṣṭānta' sa pratipādyata ityartha' //107 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2422: yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimāniti yāvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2425: evaṃ copādīyamāna uddeśyo dhūmādirvyāptatayā kathito bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:2430: yadyad yadvṛttena saṃyuktaṃ prathamaṃ prayujyate pradhānaṃ ca taduddeśyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2431: tattadvṛttuyaktaṃ ca paścāt prayujyamānaṃ sa so 'gnimāneveti caivakāreṇa yuktaṃ tadupādeyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2433: vadatyarthaṃ svaśaktyā ca śabdo vaktranapekṣayā // Msv_5,4.110 //
GSP28mimslovu:2436: viparyayeṇa vā hetau na pyāptatvaṃ vivakṣati /
GSP28mimslovu:2437: vivakṣannapi vā śabdaṃ tadyogaṃ na vaded yadi // Msv_5,4.112 //
GSP28mimslovu:2438: ghaṭe kṛtakanāśitve nāśi vyāptaṃ kṛtena vā /
GSP28mimslovu:2439: na tadeṣṭasya hetutvaṃ syādaniṣṭasya caiva tat // Msv_5,4.113 //
GSP28mimslovu:2442: te yathā tathā vā prayuktā yathābhiprāyaṃ vartiṣyanta eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2445: svābhāvikyaiva tu śaktyā kecideva kvacidevārthe vartante,
GSP28mimslovu:2446: ato na vivakṣānusāreṇeṣṭasiddhirbhavatīti vācya eva dṛṣṭāntavacanavinyāsaprakāra iti //110//
GSP28mimslovu:2447: yadi tarhi svatantrā' śabdā' atathāsthite 'pyarthe śabdānusāriṇīṣṭasiddhirbhavedata āha---sādhyahetutvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2452: arthādīnāṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhādeva sādhyahetubhāvo bhavati na śabdānurodhāditi //110 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2453: vaktranapekṣayā svaśaktyaiva śabder'thamācakṣāṇe yattāvadāpadyate tad darśayati---tatrājñānāditi sārdhadvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:2454: yadā hi dṛṣṭānta vaktumanabhijño vaktā sādhyahetvo' sahabhāvamātraṃ vivakṣati /
GSP28mimslovu:2458: satyāmapi vivakṣāyāṃ kutaścid bhramanimittāt na vyāptiyogyaṃ śabdaṃ vadati /
GSP28mimslovu:2460: viparītaṃ vā bhrānta' yatā nāsitā kṛtakatvena vyāpteti,
GSP28mimslovu:2461: tadā tāvanna kevalamiṣṭaṃ na sidhyati aniṣṭameva tu vyāptiviparyayādāpadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2464: yadā samyak prayukte 'pi vākyer'tho na tathā bhavet // Msv_5,4.114 //
GSP28mimslovu:2472: aniṣṭasyaiva tu nāśitvasya bhavedityevañjātīyakāniṣṭaprayoganivāraṇāya yukto dṛṣṭāntaprayoganiyama iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2475: arthānāṃ śabdatantratve yad bhavati tad darśayati---yadetipādarahitadvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:2476: asyārtha'--- yadā hi vyāptiśaktyanusāreṇaivārthānāṃ sādhyahetutvaṃ tadā yadyapi vaktrā na sahabāvamātraṃ darśitaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2478: arthāstu na tadanurūpavyāpyavyāpakabhāvanāvasthitā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavediti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2479: yathā nityo dhvaniramūrtatvāditi prayoge karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad vyomavaditi dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paramārthata' sādhyahetūbhayavyāptiśūnyatayā
GSP28mimslovu:2480: karma khalvanityamiti tat sādhyabhūtayā nityatayā śūnyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2483: sādhyaṃ tu nityatvaṃ teṣu vidyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2484: ghaṭe tu na sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ nāpyamūrtatvaṃ heturityubhayaśūnyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:2485: vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāptiśūnyatāmuttaratra svayameva vivariṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:2486: atraiva ca vyomavaditi dṛṣṭānte tadasadvādinaṃ sautrāntikaṃ prati prayujyamāne dharmyasiddhyā
GSP28mimslovu:2490: vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyamapekṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2491: sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyā tu yadā vyāptiṃ na lakṣayet // Msv_5,4.118 //
GSP28mimslovu:2492: para' sādharmyadṛṣṭāntāt taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadā /
GSP28mimslovu:2493: vaktā vā sahabāvitvaṃ śuddhaṃ tena vaded yadā // Msv_5,4.119 //
GSP28mimslovu:2497: tathāpi karmādiṣvamūrteṣu anityeṣvālocyamāneṣu hetorvyāptirnāstīti īdṛśasyāpi dṛṣṭāntasya varjanameva /
GSP28mimslovu:2498: ayamapi na sādhyasiddhye samartho yata iti //117//
GSP28mimslovu:2502: kiṃ sarvadaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavacanaṃ kāryaṃ na veti /
GSP28mimslovu:2503: tatra tāvad vyatirekapradhānavādina' sarvadā vācyamiti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---vyāptyā sādharmya ukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2504: evaṃ hi manyate--- vyāptiprajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭāntavacanam,
GSP28mimslovu:2505: sā cet sādharmyavacanena jñāpitā kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena /
GSP28mimslovu:2512: kadā tarhi vaidharmyaṃ vācyamata āha--- sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyeti pādatrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:2513: yadā hi vaktrā samyageva dṛṣṭānta ukte para' śrotā jānāti--- yathā hetusādhyayo' sāhityamātranenoktaṃ na vyāptiriti,
GSP28mimslovu:2514: tadā sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaṃ jñāpayituṃ 'vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhana'miti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2515: yadā khalvabhyastavaidharmyastamevāpekṣate na sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ tadā ca vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanamityāha--- taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2516: yadā vā vaktā suśikṣitavaidharmya' sādharmyaṃ vaktumajānānastena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena sahabhāvamātrameva śuddhaṃ vyāptihīnaṃ kathayati,
GSP28mimslovu:2517: tadāpi paryanuyuktena tenaiva vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhanaṃ kāryamityāha--- vaktā veti //119//
GSP28mimslovu:2528: nanvanvayavaipītye sa eva yathāvat pratipādyatāṃ kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena /
GSP28mimslovu:2530: kintu bhrāntairidamasmābhiruktaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo vivakṣita iti vaidharmyeṇāpi tāvadiṣṭasādhanaṃ bhavetyeveti /
GSP28mimslovu:2531: yattu tatpūrvaṃ sāhityamātramuktaṃ tadvaidharmya evopayujyate tasyaiveṣṭaṃ sādhayato 'nugrahe vartate ityāha--- sāhityamātramiti //120 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2535: yadā hi dhūmabhāvo 'gnibhāvena vyāpto bhavati tadānagniragnyabhāvastato dhūmāt pracyuta' sannadhūme dhamābhāva eva bhavatītyevaṃ tāvad vyāpto bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2536: yo hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati sa tanniyatastadvyāpta ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2537: yathā dhūmo 'gnāveva bhavannagninā vyāpta iti siddho 'bhāvayorvyāptiviparyaya iti //122 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2538: yata eva cābhāvayorīdṛśo vyāpavyāpakabhāva' ata eva bhāvayorabhimatavyāptisiddhirityāha---tathānagnāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:2539: anagnāvagnyabhāve dhūmābhāvena vyāpte dhūmastatra virodhivyāpteralabdhāvakāśo 'gnāveva bhavatītyevaṃ tadvyāpyatā tasya sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:2544: vyāpakau tu yadocyete bhāvābhāvau tadā tata' // Msv_5,4.124 //
GSP28mimslovu:2546: tasmād dhūmena sādhyatvamagne' prārthayate yadā // Msv_5,4.125 //
GSP28mimslovu:2550: yatrāpyarthasya śūnytavaṃ dvābhyāmekena vā bhavet // Msv_5,4.127 //
GSP28mimslovu:2552: yadā hi ya eva bhāvo vyāpakastadabhāva eva vyāpakatayā vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate tadā tato vyāpyād dhūmādernaiva vipakṣasyānagnyāde' pracyuti' kathitā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2555: na hi yatra dhūmastatrāgniritivat yatra dhūmābhāvastatrāgnyabhāva iti kathyamāne vyāpyād dhūmādanagnervipakṣasya nivṛttirdarśitā bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2556: ato dhūmenāgniṃ siṣādhayiṣatā vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntenāgnidhūmābhāvayorvyāptiviparyayo vācya ityāha--- tasmāditi vācyo 'ntena /
GSP28mimslovu:2557: yatrāgnirnāsti tatra dhūmo nāstītyevaṃ yadavṛttatadavṛttābhyāmuddeśyopādeyabhāvo darśayitavya ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:2558: sa cānagniradhūmen vyāpta ucyamāno nānyathā vācya',
GSP28mimslovu:2562: yathaiva sādharmyadṛṣṭānte svaśaktyā śabdor'thaṃ vadati nārthaśaktimanurudhyata iti sāhityamātravacane vyāptiviparyaye vā neṣṭaṃ sidhyatītyuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:2565: dihāpyartho na śabdavaśavartīti yatrārtho dṛṣṭāntarūpo dvābhyāṃ hetusādhyābhāvābhyāmekena
GSP28mimslovu:2566: vā tayo' śūnyo bhavati tatrāpi na prastutopakāro bhavati anyadvāniṣṭaṃ prasajyata
GSP28mimslovu:2571: sādhyena vyāptisiddhyai hi vyātireko 'tra kathyate // Msv_5,4.128 //
GSP28mimslovu:2573: tena dṛṣṭe 'pi sāhitye na sarvo gamya iṣyate // Msv_5,4.129 //
GSP28mimslovu:2577: nityo dhvaniramūrtatvādityatraiva prayoge yadaivaṃ vaidharmyamucyate yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtamapi na bhavati yathā paramāṇuriti tadā sādhyābhāvaśūnyo dṛṣṭānta' /
GSP28mimslovu:2586: nāsau sādhyena vyāpto bhavatītyasatyāṃ vyāptāvanarthakaṃ tādṛśasya vaidharmyasya vacanamityabhiprāyeṇāha--- sādhyeneti //128 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:2587: yataścaivañjātīyako na sādhyena vyāpyate tena kvacidabhāvayo' sāhitye dṛṣṭe 'pi na sarvatra gamyagamakabhāvo bhavatītyāha---teneti /
GSP28mimslovu:2588: yadyapi yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtamapi na bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:2607: tāvatā na hyanaṅgatvaṃ yukti' śābde 'bhidhāsyate // Msv_5,4.132 //
GSP28mimslovu:2608: 'vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyapekṣyate' ityucyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2609: na hi śatāṃśenāpi hetorvipakṣād vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamakatvamastītyaśeṣavipakṣo 'numāturvyatirekaṃ grahītumapekṣita' /
GSP28mimslovu:2617: vipakṣadarśane tu heto' paripanthinyavinābhāvo grahītumaśakyo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2618: taccaikadeśasthasyāpi tāvannāstyeveti paripanthini vṛttimātre darśanaṃ vyāpriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2619: ato yadaivāgnikāryo dhūma ityavagataṃ tadaiva tadāyattātmalābho nāsati tasmin bhavatīti jñāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2624: tat kuto 'nvaya' kutastarāṃ ca tannibandhano vyatireka' /
GSP28mimslovu:2625: na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcidanugataṃ svarūpamasti,
GSP28mimslovu:2628: ato viśeṣā eva kecit kayācid vyāvṛttyopalakṣitā' kañcid viśeṣaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena gamayantīti tatpradarśanārthaṃ vaidharmyavacanameva nyāyyamiti
GSP28mimslovu:2635: yaddhi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati tattatkāryam /
GSP28mimslovu:2638: asti sāmānyavastveṣu vyāpitā tatra gamyatām // Msv_5,4.133 //
GSP28mimslovu:2651: yathokta eva siddhānta' samyak sādharmyaprayoge na vaidharmyamapekṣaṇīyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2654: ata' sa tāvad vidhimukhena prathamaṃ darśayitavya',
GSP28mimslovu:2656: anaṅgatvamiti tu paṭhatāmiyaṃ vyākhyā---idaṃ hi liṅgasyānumāyāmaṅgatvam yadanvayavyatirekau,
GSP28mimslovu:2660: nanu liṅge 'pi śabdātmake pratītyuttarakālabhāvyanvayo 'naṅgamevāta āha--- śābde 'bhidhāsyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2661: śābde hyanumānād bhinne pratītyuttarakālabhāvinī yuktiranaṅgamiti vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2666: ye tu tāvatā nānaṅgatvamanvayasyetyadhyāhṛtyātraivārthe śābde yuktirvakṣyate iti vyācakṣate,
GSP28mimslovu:2672: yattu bhedānāmevānumāne gamyagamakatvaṃ teṣāṃ cānvayo na sambhavatītyuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:2681: na cāsati tasminnānumānāṅgaṃ sambhavatīti teṣāmanvayābhāvo na doṣāyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2687: tathāhi tasya nipuṇato nirūpyaṇāṇasyā-- sambhavād vibhrama evāyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2690: pratibandhabalena tu kiñcideva svalakṣaṇaṃ kenāpi vikalpākāreṇa sāmānyātmanā samadhigataṃ yadaparaṃ vikalpākārollikhitameva svalakṣaṇaṃ pratilambhayati tatpramāṇamityākhyāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2698: te ca na bhājanamanvayasyeti yuktamevoktamata āha--- astīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2700: bhavedevaṃ yadi na bhedātiriktaṃ kiñcit sāmānyaṃ vastu bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2705: evaṃ ca yadanumānuprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ parai' kimapi kāśaṃ kuśamavalambyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2707: anyanmataṃ vyāptyāpi sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ukte vaidharmyamapi vācyamiti,
GSP28mimslovu:2713: vyāvṛtti' sarvata' prāptā sādhyābhāve niyamyate // Msv_5,4.135 //
GSP28mimslovu:2720: tadā heto sādhyenaivāgnināvadhārite sarvato 'gnoranyamātrād vyāvṛtti' prāpnoti,
GSP28mimslovu:2724: ata' sādhyābhāva eva vyāvṛttiṃ niyantuṃ sarvadaiva vaidharmyavacanamarthavat /
GSP28mimslovu:2725: sati hi tasminnagnyabhāve dhūmo na bhavatītyāveditaṃ, bhavatīti //135//
GSP28mimslovu:2732: ata' sādharmyadṛṣṭānte 'pi vyāpyā dhūmādervyāpakābhāvanivṛtti mātremeva darśayitavyam,
GSP28mimslovu:2741: atra bhāṣyam--- 'tattu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca /
GSP28mimslovu:2743: sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca yathā--- devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptimupalabhyāditye 'pi gatismaraṇam' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2745: atra kecinnītijñaṃmanyā avadhṛtasvalaśraṇameva kvacidanumānena sāmānyato gṛhyata iti manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2752: sarvaṃ hi kādācitkaṃ phalaṃ kutaścidāgantukādutpattimato jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimslovu:2754: ato devadattasya bhūtapūrvottaradeśavibhāgasaṃyogau kadācidupalabhyāgantuka' ko 'pi heturanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2757: agnyādiṣu tu pratyakṣata' svalakṣa āvadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhamanumānamāhu' /
GSP28mimslovu:2758: na ca dravyameva saṃyogavibhāgayo' kāraṇamiti vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2760: na ca dravyāntarāgama eva śakyeta kalpayituṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2762: na ca sadṛśāparāparotpattivipralabdhā bhedaṃ na budhyanta iti sāmpratam,
GSP28mimslovu:2768: bhāṣyakāro darśayati--- yathā vakṣyati“na hi te pratyakṣe“iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2770: vyaktameva deśāntaraprāptiphalonnīyamānatvameva karmaṇo darśayatīti siddhaṃ kriyādīnāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaikaviṣayatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:2771: evaṃ ca prameyadvaividhyādanumānadvaividhyopapattiriti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---dvaividhyaṃ nopapannamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2778: pratyakṣameva hi vayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpnuvantaṃ devadattaṃ gacchatīti manyāmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:2781: nanu devadatte deśasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktamaparaṃ karmaṇa' kimapi rūpamaparokṣamīkṣamahe /
GSP28mimslovu:2789: idamapi hi tato na bhidyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2791: ato jātikalpanāvat karmakalpanāmapi pratyakṣapakṣa eva nikṣipanta' pañcadhā savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vibhajāmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:2797: na caiṣa devadattamiva calantaṃ spandamānamādityamapi paśyatīti dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2799: saṃyogavibhāgau tu tasyāpi pratīyete eveti tulya(va?svā)
GSP28mimslovu:2801: api ca vibhāgopakrame saṃyogāvasāne ca karmaṇi tata unnīyamāne gacchatīti vartamānanirbhāsa' pratyayo na bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:2806: sthāṇau ca śyenaviyukte śyena iva karmānumīyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:2810: eva tarhi yadaika' śyenaviyukta' sthāṇuranyena saṃyujyate tatra prasaṅga' /
GSP28mimslovu:2812: yadi tūcyate yo 'yamutpatata' śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyoga' tasya sthāṇusamavetena karmaṇā niṣpattyasambhavānna tatra karmānumānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2816: asti ca sthāṇau kāraṇapribaddhaphaladarśanamiti nānumodaya' śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2818: śyenasamavāyinaiva karmaṇā sthāṇāvapi saṃyogavibhāgopapattau na tadgatakarmānumānamiti cet tanna /
GSP28mimslovu:2820: vyāptaṃ hi liṅgaṃ yatra yatra dṛśyate tatra tatra vyāpakamupasthāpayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2827: na ca sthāṇo' śyeno deśa ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2834: na ca tamo nāma kiñcidvastvasti bhavatsiddhānte,
GSP28mimslovu:2836: atastatsaṃyogavibhāgahetuko 'pi na kriyāvasāya' śakyate samādhātumiti na pratyakṣe karmaṇi dvaividhvopapatti' /
GSP28mimslovu:2837: yā tu 'na hi te pratyakṣe' ityapratyakṣatoktā,
GSP28mimslovu:2838: tāṃ tatraivānyathā vyākhyāsyāma' “rūpaśabdāvibhāgam” iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣameva krametyāsthitam /
GSP28mimslovu:2840: itarathā hyupalabdhimātrapratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅgādivannityābhāva eva karmaṇo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2843: kiṃ tarhi? āśrayasya deśāntaraprāpakatvarūpeṇa na svarūpata' karmāstītyapūrvātmanā karmaṇo 'vasthānaṃ darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2844: 'ihāpi devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptimupadityayorubhayorapi karmaṇo 'numeyatvāt kena viśeṣeṇāditye gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayodāhriyate
GSP28mimslovu:2846: ato naivaṃvidhaṃ granthato yuktito vā ghaṭata iti sūktamanupannamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2854: pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhasya pratiyogitayopāttaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ tatrāpi gatiprāptyākṛtyo' pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandha iti na pratiyoginorasaṅkara iti //138//
GSP28mimslovu:2855: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyāmapi pakṣīkṛtādityagaterapratyakṣatvāt na pratyakṣadṛṣṭa' sambandha ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2861: yadi tvagnidhūmākṛtyo' kvacinmahānasādau apratyakṣopalabandhiriṣyate sā tarhi devadatte 'pi gate' pratyakṣatvādastītyāha---kvaciditi //139//
GSP28mimslovu:2862: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣato dṛṣṭatā sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayā saṅkīryate ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2865: yadi hi devadattādidharmyantarāpekṣaivāditye gatyanumānasya sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṣyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2876: yadāgnirbudhyate tasya parvabodhākat puna' puna' // Msv_5,4.142 //
GSP28mimslovu:2881: bahuvrīhi', tajjanyo 'yaṃ dhūmaviśeṣ iti ca prāk pratyakṣeṇa matiṃ kṛtvā punaśca
GSP28mimslovu:2882: kiyatā vilambanenānyatra kvacid katvā gata' san taddeśasthena tenaiva dhūmaviśeṣeṇa
GSP28mimslovu:2885: anena ca viśeṣadṛṣṭameva pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśabdenocyata iti vyākhyātam /
GSP28mimslovu:2889: tadadvāreṇa tvanumānasyāpi tādṛśo viśeṣo viṣayo bhavatīti yuktaiva pratyakṣaśabdena viśeṣalakṣaṇā /
GSP28mimslovu:2890: viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya bhavati pratiyogīti dvaividhyopapattiriti bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:2895: taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminneva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgniranumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2902: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇamidaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye ākṛtigrahaṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:2903: evaṃ hi viśeṣa eva darśayitavyo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2912: sa evāyamadya yāvadanuvartamāno gomayendhanavikārasya dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2919: ata' prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānamāditya ekāntata' sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambanthamiti yuktamevādityodāharaṇamiti //145//
GSP28mimslovu:2928: tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau pratyakṣaviṣayatvamupapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ 'pratyakṣatvamata' siddhaṃ sāmānyasye'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:2929: nanu yastveva na sāmānyaṃ kiñcidasti nāma /
GSP28mimslovu:2950: yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya svārtha' prāpyakāritvādindriyāṇām /
GSP28mimslovu:2952: aviśeṣeṇopādāne tu nābāvānyapramāṇatvasya vastvālambanatayā vyāpti' kathitā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2959: evaṃ vastvālambantve 'numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyaṃ vastvityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2962: yadvaditi(?) svapratibhāse 'narther'thādhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntirapyarthasambandhena pravṛttestadavyabhicārāt pramāṇamanumānamiti,
GSP28mimslovu:2963: teṣāmidamuttaram artha' sāmānyamanumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2965: evamarthād vastutvaṃ prasādhyāhratya prasādhayati---sāmānyasya ca vastutvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2966: sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvādasādhāraṇavastuvaditi vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2973: na cānavagataṃ liṅgaṃ kiñcidasti prakāśakam // Msv_5,4.150 //
GSP28mimslovu:2982: bauddhānāmeva tu sāmānyamanumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānāmanavasthā prasajyata ityāha--- sāmānyamiti pañcabhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:2991: ayamabhiprāya'--- na tāvat pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3013: tadeva hi pramāṇaṃ tadā sarvasya liṅgaliṅgisāmānyasyāvabodhakaṃ bhavediti //155//
GSP28mimslovu:3020: yathā hyapramāṇameva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇamiṣyate tathā liṅgajñānamapi bhaviṣyatītyartha' //157//
GSP28mimslovu:3023: tacca pramāṇameveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta iti //158//
GSP28mimslovu:3025: tadabhāvāt smṛtiścātra na kathañcit pravartate // Msv_5,4.159 //
GSP28mimslovu:3030: na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatītyāha---na tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:3031: na hyatra prāgapi liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcidupapadyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3039: evametadapi liṅgajñānaṃ nirvakalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā tadabhedena smārtamiti yo vadati tasya vandhyāsutre 'pi smaraṇaśaktiranivāritā /
GSP28mimslovu:3041: na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvakalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanamiti kathaṃ smṛti' /
GSP28mimslovu:3043: yacca gṛhītaṃ sanna prakāśata iti na smṛtitvam /
GSP28mimslovu:3044: agṛhītagocarāyāṃ tu smṛtau vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaprasaṅga iti //160//
GSP28mimslovu:3053: na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāva' kathañciddeśata' kālato vā dṛṣṭa' /
