GSP28mimslovu:6505: na hi svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryādityādyarthe svargakāmo yajeteti vākyaṃ samyagiṣyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6507: yāgena svargaṃ kuryāditi hi tatra sthāsyati /
GSP28mimslovu:6528: atraiva sādhye pūrvoktā'--- 'nānyatvāt' iti bhāṣyavyākhyānāvasara uktā'--- doṣavarjitai' kāraṇai' janyamānatvāt,
GSP28mimslovu:6530: deśādibhede 'pi deśādibhede 'pi bādhavarjanāt iti hetavo darśayitavyā ityāha--- atreti //2//
GSP28mimslovu:6535: asyārtha'--- śabdārthasambandhānāṃ nityatvamāśrityānapekṣatvāditi sūtrakāreṇa yo hetu' svata' prāmāṇyasidhyarthamukta',
GSP28mimslovu:6536: tena codanānāmaprāmāṇye nirākṛte 'dhunā sambandhodbhavatvābhāvena paro bauddhādirmithyātvamuktavān /
GSP28mimslovu:6537: evaṃ ca tadā vārtikakāreṇa vṛttikāramatenātraiva svata' prāmāṇyaṃ vyutpādyamiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:6538: tathā ca 'sūtrakāreṇa cocyata' iti punaruktiparihāre parata' paprāmāṇyoktairevākṣepahetubhi' pūrvapakṣo 'bhihita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6539: ihāpi ca bhāṣyakāreṇa 'brūta' ityucyate--- avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:6542: naiva vāstyatra sambandha' kṛtako veti vakṣyate //5//
GSP28mimslovu:6546: codanāmithyārthanirāsārthaṃ hi sambamandhasadbhāvo nityatā ca heturukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:6555: anādṛtapratibandhastu yatkiñcid vidvān sa sarvaṃ jānīyādityatiprasajyata iti //4,5//
GSP28mimslovu:6556: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvādaya' sambandhā' śabdasyānupapannā ityuktvā saṃśleṣasambandhabhāva eva darśita',
GSP28mimslovu:6564: evaṃ hi manyante--- na tāvad varṇā' śabda',
GSP28mimslovu:6567: ata eva gośabdatvādijātyasambhavāt bhūtādiviśeṣāṇāṃ ca pratiprayogamanyatvenāvācakatvād
GSP28mimslovu:6580: sa cāyamevambhūtor'tha' śabdena janyata eveti kāryakāraṇabhāvameva śabdārthayo' sambandhamātiṣṭhante /
GSP28mimslovu:6583: dṛṣṭā hi khalu mṛtsalilapracchannā api vrīhayo 'ṅkurādikāryamārabhamāṇā aviditasvarūpaśaktayo 'pīti sūktam--- asambhavena śeṣāṇāmiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6586: gaurayamiti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdopaśliṣṭamarthamavayanto laukikā dṛśyante /
GSP28mimslovu:6589: laukikāśca prāyeṇa saṃśleṣameva saṃbandhaṃ manyante iti sa eva sambandha' prasakko nirākārya ityāha--- tasminniti prāhāyena bhavati sa taddeśa eva dṛśyate rañjuriva ghaṭe,
GSP28mimslovu:6594: dvayaṃ vā parasparamasambaddhamitaretaradeśe tadanantaradeśe vādṛṣṭe' sādhyamityāha--- dvayamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6595: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'syāccedarthena sambandha' kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhyasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām', ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6597: asyārtha'--- atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śabdārthayo' sambnadhasiddhyarthaṃ taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti heturantarṇīta',
GSP28mimslovu:6598: taṃ ca gaurayamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītibhramād yo nāmāsiddhaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6606: mukhaṃ ca tasya deśa iti kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām,
GSP28mimslovu:6607: na ca te sta'ṣa tasmānmodakādyarthakriyānupalambhācchabdadeśe taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti siddho hetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:6614: atrāyamabhiprāya'---- pratyāyyapratyāyakaśaktirūpo hi na' śabdārthayo' sambandho 'bhipreta', tad yadi
GSP28mimslovu:6619: yadi tu vācyavācakasambandhamevābhipretya na śabdār'thena saṅgata iti sādhyate tato laukikavirodha ityāha---vācyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:6627: tadya eva teṣāmanyatama' para' pratipādayitumabhipreto bhavati sa eva vācyavācakasambandhavarjitai' pratijñārthagaucarai' padai' pratipādayitumaśakya',
GSP28mimslovu:6628: ata' pratijñāṃ prayuñjānairāśrita' śabādarthayorvācyavācakalakṣaṇasambandha iti tanninirākaraṇe svavāgvirodha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6634: śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6637: asyārtha'--- ekasyāmabhidhānakriyāyāṃ śabda' karaṇaṃ kartā vā,
GSP28mimslovu:6642: nirūpita'--- sambandha iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6643: yadvā--- ekasyāṃ gavādyarthapratipattau sādhyamānāyāmekena vaktropādīyamānāvaruṇaikahānīvadvivakṣitasāhityau śabdārtho yanniyamyete so 'nayo' sambandha ityāha--- pratipattāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:6645: upādeyasya hi viśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bhavati śorivaikatvaṃ--- paśunā yajeteti /
GSP28mimslovu:6662: vyavahāradarśanāt anabhihitamapyarthaṃ jānāti tadā sthālyādīnāṃ vivakṣitaṃ sāhityaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6664: evamihāpi bāla' prayojyavṛddhasya viviṣṭārthavyavahāradarśanena tadviṣayāṃ buddhimanumāya śabdānantarabhāvitayā śabdakāraṇatāṃ tādavavadhārayati
GSP28mimslovu:6667: evaṃ ca viditvā svayamapi parārthaprayoge sahitau śabdārthau hṛdayamāveśitāvupādāya
GSP28mimslovu:6668: śabdaṃ coccārya parapratipattiṃ bhāvayatīti sūktaṃ sāhityavivakṣā varṇasāhityavivakṣāvaditi //12-13 1/2 //
GSP28mimslovu:6673: nanvevaṃ vadatā śabdārthayo' kriyāsambandha eva darśita',
GSP28mimslovu:6676: vakṣyati hi--- 'guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvādasambandha' samatvāt' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6678: kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakatvāt sarvasambandhānāṃ kriyākārakasambandha eva darśita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6679: astu tāvat, taduttarakālabhāvī tu ko 'nayo' sambandha iti vācyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:6683: tasyāṃ ca kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī parasparopakāryopakārakalakṣaṇa' śabdārthayorasti sambandha'//
GSP28mimslovu:6685: tathāhi --- atra tāvadekasyāṃ kriyāyāmupakāryopakārakatvaṃ śabdārthayo' sambandha ityuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:6695: ato vivecanīyamidam--- ko 'tra sambandha' śabdārthayorvārttikakārasyābhimata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6699: na ca guṇena svamahimnā āśrayabhūtadravyamātramupādīyamānamapi kraye gṛhyate, (svakīyago)
GSP28mimslovu:6702: vacchedāt tad guṇamātramupādīyamānamapi krayakriyā na pratīcchati svakīyāruṇimaguṇāvarodhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6707: śrūyatām--- artho hi na pratipādakamantareṇa pratipādyo bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:6717: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā sambandha ityevamādaya' samullāpā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6721: na ca sadānīṃ tau na sta', nityatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6726: saṃjñeti gamakatvaṃ cenna tadaṅgamiyaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,9.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:6730: arthe ca pratipādyaśakti' ata eva sambandho nitya ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6731: nanvemapi karahastādibhiranekai' śabdairekatrārthe pratipādye anekārthavacane caikasmin gavādiśabde kathamavyabhicāra' śakyate 'vagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:6732: ata' prakaraṇādīnāmapi padārthāvadhāraṇāpoyatvād vṛddhavyavahāre hi bālena kevalapadāprayogādāvāpoddhārabhedenaitadavadhāritam---
GSP28mimslovu:6733: yadā yadarthavivakṣayā śabda' prayujyate sa tasyārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6738: tadevamarthaprakaraṇādibhedabhinnamanyayānyayā ca śaktyopahitamanyadanyacca padamanyasyānyasya vācakamiti na padavyabhicāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:6739: artho 'pi codbhūtatatpadābhidhānayogyāvasthābhedabhinno hastādiranyo 'nyaśac karādipadānāṃ vācya iti na padaṃ vyabhicarati /
GSP28mimslovu:6743: nanvevamekriyānimittako niyama' śabdārthayo' sambandha ityucyamāne 'numānāṅgamavinābhāva evāśrito bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:6744: atastadabalena dhūmādivāgnijñānaṃ śabdādarthajñānamupajāyamānamanumānaṃ syādata āha---na cāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6755: sānaṅgaṃ tadvadeva syānneyaṃ dhūmādibhi' samā // Msv_5,9.18 //
GSP28mimslovu:6757: gamakatvena pūrvaṃ ca tatra notpadyate mati' // Msv_5,9.19 //
GSP28mimslovu:6759: yadaiva ceha sambandhaṃ vṛddhebhya' pratipādyate // Msv_5,9.20 //
GSP28mimslovu:6770: yathaivāvinanābhāva eva dhūmādau pratītyaṅgaṃ na taduttarakālabhāvi gamakatvam,
GSP28mimslovu:6774: tatra hi dhūmādau mahānasādideśe 'gnyavinābhāvanirūpaṇottarakālaṃ tatkṛtaivāsau gamakateti /
GSP28mimslovu:6775: api ca dhūme prathamaṃ gamakatvaṃ nāvagamyata ityāha -- gamakatveneti //19//
GSP28mimslovu:6777: gamakatvenaiva śabde prathamaṃ vyutpattirityuktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti---kathayantītitrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:6781: tathāha--- vṛddhopadeśe tāvadayamasya vācya' ayamasya vācaka
GSP28mimslovu:6785: itthaṃ vācakatā siddhā saṅkīrṇāpi tata' param // Msv_5,9.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:6791: yatrāpi kvaciduccaritād vākyāt prayojyavṛddhasyārthāviṣayāṃ kriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā ceṣṭānumānena gavādyarthaboddhṛtvamupakalpyate tatrāpi yasmādata' śabdādanenāyamartho 'vagata',
GSP28mimslovu:6793: prasiddhapadāntarasamabhivyāhāre 'pi iha sahakāratarau madhuraṃ piko rautītyevamādau
GSP28mimslovu:6794: viditasahākarādādyartho 'viditapikādyarthaśca yo 'yaṃ sahakāratarau rauti tasya pikaśabdo
GSP28mimslovu:6795: gamaka iti gamakatvamevāvagacchatīti siddhaṃ sarvatra gamakatvaṃ na vyutpattiriti //21-23 1/2 //
GSP28mimslovu:6804: na ca tān pratyavacākā' śabdā iti yuktaṃ vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:6815: tena tarhi kimarthaṃ vivañcate ata āha--balābalādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6816: śāstrasthā hyanirūpitaśaktayo na śāstrārthamanuṣṭhātuṃ śaknuvantīti teṣāṃ hānopādānopayogī śabdaśaktiviveka iti te viviñcata iti //26 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:6824: tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣā' sāmānyaśabdasya svārthena kakṣyayāntaritā bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:6825: yathā sacchabdasya sattāmācakṣāṇasya tadantaritā dravyatvādaya' sāmānyaviśeṣā',
GSP28mimslovu:6826: teṣu cāsau lakṣaṇābalena pravartamāno durbalo jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6827: svarthe tu śrutyā vartate iti sa tatra balavān /
GSP28mimslovu:6828: kā punariyaṃ lakṣaṇā nāma--- abhidheyavinābhāvena pratīti' /
GSP28mimslovu:6831: kriyā kiyadvābhidheyāvinābhāvena lakṣyate kiyat svamahimnā śabdenocyata iti śāstrasthānāmanuṣṭhānaviśeṣārthaṃ viveko yukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:6832: sā ca lakṣaṇā prāyeṇa nityasambandhād bhavatīti nityasambandhādityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6838: ṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti brāhmaṇasāmānyasthā brāhmaṇaśrutirlakṣamayā
GSP28mimslovu:6839: tadviśeṣaṃ kauṇḍinyamavatarantī durbalā bhavati ityavyavahitaviśeṣasthayā kauṇḍinyaśrutyā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6841: yaju' sāmānyasthā 'upāṃśuyajuṣā'iti śrutistadviśeṣasthayā 'uccairnigadena' iti śrutyā bādhyata ityevamādi darśayitavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6842: sāmānyaśabdenātra viśeṣān viśiṃṣanna sāmānyatiriktā' kecana viśeṣā vidyanta iti darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:6843: asati hi keṣāñcid darśanaṃ-- nityadravyavṛttayo 'ntyā viśeṣā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6844: te ca vyāvṛttibuddhereva hetutvād viśeṣā eveti /
GSP28mimslovu:6845: paramāṇukārayamakaṃ hi kāṇādā dvyaṇukādikrameṇa jagato nirmāṇamātiṣṭhante /
GSP28mimslovu:6847: ata' santi kecanāṇusamavāyino viśeṣā nāma ye tānitaretarato vyāvartayantīti saṅgirante /
GSP28mimslovu:6854: śiṃśapātvena śiṃśapā vṛkṣāntarebhya ityevamaṇūn yāvadiya viśeṣakathā vartayitavyā /
GSP28mimslovu:6858: pṛthaktvākhyo vā guṇasteṣāmanyonyasya viśeṣakatvād viśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:6863: yoginastu tān paśyantīti śraddhadhānā budhyante vayamaśraddhadhānā' sma',
GSP28mimslovu:6864: ye yuktiṃ prārthayāmaha iti sūktaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣeṣviti //27-28 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:6876: gośabdasya bahulaṃ prayogāt tadviśeṣeṣu ca śābaleyādiṣu asatsvapi bāhuleyādiṣu proya(gā?ga)
GSP28mimslovu:6877: darśanāt parasāmānye ca sattādau satyapi bhāvāntare 'prayogāt sāsnādibhi' sahaikāvayavirūpārthasamnabdhigotvamātrasya
GSP28mimslovu:6878: gośabdo vācaka ityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñānaṃ janyate sāsnādyekārthasambandhīti cāvinābhāvinā
GSP28mimslovu:6880: ata' siddhaṃ gamyagamakabhāva eva śabdārthayo' sambandha' prathamamavagamyate na punaravinābhāva iti //29-30 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:6883: na ca gamakaṃ saṃjñeti laukikā manyante,
GSP28mimslovu:6903: devadattādayo hi yadṛcchāśabdā yatraiva saṅketyate tameva pratīpādayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:6910: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yadi pratyāyaka' śabda' prathamaśruta' kiṃ na pratyāyayati' iti
GSP28mimslovu:6911: paricodya 'sarvatra no darśanaṃ pramāṇam' ityādinā darśanabalena gṛhītaśaktika' pratyāyayatīti parihāra ukta',
GSP28mimslovu:6917: syādetat--- prakāśakā' pradīpādayo 'viditasambandhā api svārthaṃ prakāśayanto dṛśyante,
GSP28mimslovu:6926: api ca vrīhyādayo 'gṛgītasvarūpā api kāryamārabhanta eveti śabde taddharma' kiṃ nāropyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6930: kena vedamājñāpitaṃ jñāpakena svarūpagrahaṇamapekṣitavyaṃ na sambandhagrahaṇamiti,
GSP28mimslovu:6935: na hi tatkāṇaṃ loke vede vā kiñcidīdṛśam /
GSP28mimslovu:6938: bāhyāntaravibhāgena kvacit syād vā vivakṣayā // Msv_5,9.38 //
GSP28mimslovu:6940: kiṃ cakṣuṣā mamaitena dṛṣṭaṃ dīpena yanmayā // Msv_5,9.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:6941: kṣāyāmapi, darśanabalādeva hi liṅgaśabdādayo jñāpakaviśeṣā' sambandhagrahaṇamapekṣante /
GSP28mimslovu:6947: nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇāt prāgapyabhidhāne śabda' śakto na vā /
GSP28mimslovu:6955: yadi hyanugrāhakāpekṣā svaśaktiṃ vihanyāt sarvameva laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇatāṃ jahyāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6957: kiñca--- astu tāvaditikartavyatāpekṣā karaṇabhāvaṃ na vihantīti,
GSP28mimslovu:6961: ata āha--- bāhyāntareti bāhyamapi kvacid vivakṣāta' kārakapravṛtte' karaṇatayā vivakṣyata ityāha--- kvacitsyādveti //38//
GSP28mimslovu:6967: gauravāt karaṇatvena mataṃ cet kena vāryate // Msv_5,9.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:6972: kintu kitaścittāratamyaviśeṣād bāhyameva pradīpaṃ karaṇatayā vivakṣatīti //39//
GSP28mimslovu:6974: nityavṛttau nityaṃ tu kāryasiddhau āntarasya takṣuṣa' karaṇatvamavagamyata ityāha---nityavṛttāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:6978: ata' kathaṃ tadapekṣayā cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---śarīreti /
GSP28mimslovu:6982: ātmamana' saṃyogo hi rasādijñānasādhāraṇo nāvyabhicāritayā rūpadarśanakāraṇamiti
GSP28mimslovu:6986: anena yattadāgamanyāyena sambandhagrahaṇameva kāraṇamāpadyetetyuktaṃ tadapi vivakṣāviśeṣavaśenāstviti darśitamiti //42//
GSP28mimslovu:6987: aparamapi--- 'yathā cakṣurdraṣṭṭana bāhyena prakāśena vinā' ityādi parihārabhāṣyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:6993: ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa ceṣṭaśced dhruvaṃ kṛta' // Msv_5,9.45 //
GSP28mimslovu:6995: samaṃ nāstyanayo' kiñcit tenāsaṅgatatā svata' // Msv_5,9.46 //
GSP28mimslovu:6998: yadṛcchāśabdānāmapi jñānasāmarthyaṃ vidyamānameva niyogenābhivyajyata ityadhyāsavāde varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:6999: atra ca yathā cakṣuriti bhāṣye cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvamityatropapattimāha---prakāśaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:7001: tadevamupapādita' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' kṛtakatvena bhāṣyakṛtākṣipta'--- 'yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati kṛtakastarhi' iti,
GSP28mimslovu:7003: evaṃ cātra prayoga'--- ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa kṛtaka',
GSP28mimslovu:7008: ayamartha'--- yathā rajjusarpādiṣu bhinnadeśakālādhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid deśādi samaṃ nāsti,
